description: Hot tub (New tub June 2021!) honeymoon cabin with deck for sunbathing and indoor jacuzzi. Love Shack is a 1 bedroom, 1 bath, studio style cabin. It features a comfy handmade King bed. Relax and unwind: lots of nature with 7 acres of woods around you. Kitchen and swing. Fireside rockers. Sunset Mountain Views! Just for two people in love.The spaceBeautiful forested ridge top with lots of privacy just 5 miles to Gatlinburg or Pigeon Forge. Hiking close by in the amazing Great Smoky Mountains National Park.The cabin is a studio log cabin with a fantastic Smoky Mountain view. Enjoy the hot tub (*NEW JUNE 2021*) on the deck and park style charcoal grill (charcoal not supplied). Inside there is massive, hand-crafted king-size log bed. The cabin has a fully stocked kitchen w/ dishwasher, microwave, coffee maker. It features an open floor plan with flat screen HDTV with cable, DVD player and Netflix, electric fireplace, and all linens supplied. Of course there is running water, central air/heat and high speed WiFi Internet. Enjoy the convenience to area attractions like Dixie Stampede, Dollywood, and The Christmas Place.Motorcycles and trailers are not recommended. 4-wheel drive is recommended for adverse winter conditions. No refunds for weather or driving issues.There is a floodlight camera on the exterior of the cabin to monitor the entryway. It lights the walkway for our guests, captures video of any wildlife that wanders near the cabin, and helps with weather monitoring and occupancy compliance.Minimum age 21 to reserve the cabin.Guest accessYou will have the entire cabin to yourselves!
additional_house_rules: Booking guest must be 21+
interaction: We are pleased to provide you as much information about the area as you like, but we won't bother you during your stay. We won't be onsite but are online to ensure you have a memorable stay.
transit: The road up to the cabin is very STEEP.  The access roads to this cabin are paved all the way except the last 100 yards (gravel) but do have an incline. The roads are wide road but there are a few  blind curves. We can make it up in a Prius with no problem. This cabin is not for the less adventurous type. If you want flat roads this is not for you. If you want to be near the park with a nice view and hiking nearby... look no further! Motorcycles and trailers are not recommended. 4-wheel drive is recommended for adverse winter conditions. No refunds for weather or driving issues. No refunds for weather or driving issues.

description: Welcome to Squirrel's Nest View!  Unbelievable views of The Great Smoky Mountains National Park and Mt. Leconte await at this gorgeous cabin!  This cabin is only 3.6 miles to the heart of downtown Gatlinburg, TN!  the cabin features gorgeous hardwood floors, walls, and ceilings!  Sit on the deck and relax in the hot tub while you stare in awe of the gorgeous Smoky Mountains!  This cabin offers Mother Nature at its very finest!  Come see the best views Gatlinburg has to offer!The spaceThis cabin offers the very best views in all of Gatlinburg, TN!  It features a private deck and hot tub with panoramic views of The Great Smoky Mountains National Park and Mt. Leconte (the highest mountain in the park)!Studio Cabin- King Bed, Smart TV, Queen Sleeper Sofa, Gas Fireplace (seasonal), High Speed WifiBathroom-  Stand-Up ShowerKitchen- Stainless Steel Appliances, Quartz Countertops, Pots, Pans, Plates, Cups, Bowls, Silverware, Keurig and Regular Coffee Makers (Bring Your Own Coffee)Porch- Hot Tub, Seating, CoveredGuest accessEntire CabinOther things to noteMust be 21 or older to book this cabin.This cabin sleeps 4 guests maximum.We always recommend 4x4 drive for anywhere in The Great Smoky Mountains. (bring your own charcoal)

description: Treetops Resort in Gatlinburg has been rated a Gold Crown Resort, the highest rating by RCI,for 27 consecutive years; 1 of only 40 Resorts of the 1000's in RCI to achieve over 25 years GoldThe spaceThe "New"Tree Loft Cottages have King Master Suite,Queen Bedroom 1st level,and 2 twin beds in the Loft. Full Kitchen, Dining Room,Living w/Fireplace, Master Bath w/whirlpool,2nd bthrm, Washer/Dryer, and 2 Decks.  Resort has 4Pools,1 Indoor each w/Hottubs..amenities too many to list.  See Reviews! Resort is located on Roaring Fork Road in Gatlinburg, TN.  Roaring Fork stream, which is with stocked rainbow trout, runs adjacent to the resort.  The resort also adjoins the Mountain Smokey National Park, at the end of the Motor Nature Trail.  You can walk directly into the National Park from the resort. The Resort is beautifully situated among the trees with the Roaring Fork Stream rushing by,  and you can fish for trout from the Resort property.There are 3 outdoor pools and1 new heated Indoor pool. Hottubs  are found at each pool.  The Resort has an exercise room, a racquetball court, a basketball court, shuffleboard and putting green with an Activies Center for various crafts, pool table, occasional entertainment by local artists.  Clothes Washers and Dryers are available on property. The Smokey Mtn National Park has many walking trails and waterfalls to enjoy.  Groceries, Restaurants and an abundance of local Artisans nearby.  Pigeon Forge and Sevierville with all of the kids themed attractions, Dollywood and many restaurants and Outlet malls for shopping. Ober Gatlinburg is accessed by tram up the mountain to winter sports,  skiing, sledding and an ice skating ring. A snowblowing machine keeps winter sports going when mother nature doesn't cooperate. The longest suspension bridge for pedestrians in the Appalachians opened within the last few years. Over 10 million visitors come to the Smokies every year for great family vacations.... Make this the year you join them for a Great Vacation.
interaction: My contact information, such as my phone number and email address will be available to you after making your Instant Booking. The Resort has a Check In office with friendly staff to assist you, and an onsite security person is available for late check in or other needs after the office close at other times during the year.   I prefer to rent on a Weekly basis.  Check In Day for all Loft units is Friday. There are the following weeks listed, please check availability on the Calendar:See my other Airbnb listings for the TREETOPS RESORTS main area! Lots of Peak Summer and October weeks to rent. Those 2 Bedroom units, have a Queen Bedroom,  2Twin Beds and a Queen Size Sleeper sofa and 2 bathrooms. Living,Dining,Balconies, Full Kitchen, etc.If my Loft units are all booked up for the weeks you want,  please check the availability of the other two  2 Bedroom units in the main Resort area "Treetops....." Saturday Check In Day,  and "Treetops ..... Sunday Check In Thanks for your interest!  I'm sure you and your friends and family will have a great memorable filled  vacation at Treetops Resort , an RCI Gold Crown Status Resort...for over 25 straight years... one of only 40 resorts of the thousands of resorts in the largest Worldwide RCI exchange system.Bill
transit: Treetops Resort is located on Roaring Fork Road where the Smokey Mountain MotorNature Trail ends.  Guests can walk into the Smokey Mountain National Park from the Resort.Free Trolleys are available at many locations through Gatlinburg and run to Pigeon Forge also.   The most convenient Trolley stop is in my opinion is on Route 321 at a Supermarket about 2 miles away from the Resort. Drive your car to the Supermarket, park and catch the Trolley... plus you can grab some groceries at the store when you pick up your car and head back to the Resort. My family and I have walked down Roaring Fork Road about a 1/2 mile or less, and catching theTrolley to downtown Gatlinburg .  The harder part after you catch the Trolley back up to the Resort, is the uphill walk back up Roaring Fork Road.  Good exercise but not for everyone. To enjoy all the NationalPark has to offer,  and enjoy the shops and attractions in Gatlinburg and the nearby Pigeon Forge,  you will want to have a car.

description: Stay at the Incredible Mountain View Lodge formerly known as “peaceful place” under new management. This newly updated 2 bed 2 bath cabin sleeps up to 6 people with 2 king beds and a queen sleeper sofa. This cabin has a large deck and hot tub facing this amazing view. Open floor concept with all the luxuries of home, and more with all your cooking needs, linens, and hot tub. Approx 6 min. to Gatlinburg strip, less than a mile from Ober, and mins from The National Park.  Book your stay today!!The spaceWelcome to the Incredible Mountain View Lodge!This 2 bedroom 2 bath cabin not only has jaw dropping views from inside and outside on the deck, but it also is in a Great location!!You will only be:3 minutes from Ober Gatlinburg7 minutes from Downtown Gatlinburg strip8-10 minutes to Great Smoky Mountains National Park20-25 minutes from Dollywood theme parkYou will enjoy the fact that this cabin has no steps from parking the car (parking for 3 cars) to walking inside up the gradual ramp. Once inside it's hard to take your eyes off of the Incredible Mountain View of Mt LeConte (which has the third highest peak in the park at 6,593ft) that is visible from the living room, dining area, kitchen and sitting nook! Natural light will pour in through the two glass sliding doors and three windows across the back wall. Adjacent to that is a stone wood burning fireplace with beautiful chevron design wood going up to the 14 foot vaulted ceiling.After a day full of adventure come back and relax on the couch watching a movie on the 65 in 4k smart tv. High speed Wi-Fi is provided for streaming movies or getting a little work done. Although Gatlinburg has so many amazing restaurants, this cabin has a beautiful open concept kitchen stocked with pots, pans, utensils and more. Enjoy your dinner at the stunning herringbone dining room table with six chairs. This kitchen also features a coffee bar with a Keurig that can make single K cups or a 12 cup pot for everyone to enjoy. Start your day off with your favorite beverage relaxing in the sitting nook with panoramic windows to soak up the view or step out onto the large deck with rocking chairs to breathe in the mountain air.Soaking in the hot tub while gazing at the stars and seeing the twinkling lights of the downtown Gatilnburg strip and Anakeesta is sure to put a smile on your face.Another great feature of this cabin is that everything is on one level. Both bedrooms will have you wanting to curl up in the comfy king size beds, that have custom built in headboards with outlets for charging your phones. Both bedrooms also have Roku smart tv’s.From the master bedroom walk through the sliding barn door into the gorgeous master bathroom with white tongue and groove walls and stained tongue and groove ceilings.The second bath is just a short walk down the hall from the second bedroom. If you want or need to do a load of laundry feel free to use the laundry room through the main bath.The third sleeping area is a queen size pull out sofa located in the living room.Guest accessWhether you're looking to get swole in the gym, take a dip in the pool, or play some games check out the owners club. This place is only 0.4 miles from the cabin. Enjoy a walk to the club house or hop in the car. In total there are three club houses that you will have access to. Here is some info about the club house from their website.The South Clubhouse features a 58,000 gal swimming pool with sections from 1ft. – 9 ft., tennis courts, shuffleboard, horseshoes and a kid’s play-land enclosure for children 12 and under.The Clubhouse game room has pool tables, ping pong, foosball table, checkers, chess and video games as well as a small “home style” work out room with a universal gym and other equipment to help you stay in your exercise routine.South Clubhouse offers free wireless access for both homeowners and overnight guests. You simply need your laptop and a current pass.Changing rooms and showers are available; however, you must bring your own towels. Drink machines and concessions are available during operating hours. Pools are officially open Friday Memorial day weekend through Labor day 9am-9pm. South Baden facility and pools closed on Tuesdays. North pool closed on Wednesday.Other things to noteIt is not uncommon to see a bear or four! While they look so cute and cuddly, please do not try to get close or feed the bear. Also, it is encouraged to keep your vehicle locked to avoid giving the bear a place to nap and eat your snacks.We do have two ring cameras on the exterior of the cabin. One at the front door and one for the parking area. Please do not block the shared driveway.During winter months an AWD or 4x4 is recommended if snow is present. Coming up our driveway does gain elevation for the Incredible View.
additional_house_rules:
Our cabin does use a septic system so please only flush toilet paper down the toilet. All this to avoid unnecessary clogs, that if happen due to your wrongful placement of unapproved items determined by a plumber will result in a fee.

No smoking / no vaping


Do not turn off Heat/AC

description: Take It Easy is perfect for a romantic getaway - this is what you imagine when you want to relax in a cabin in the mountains!!Centrally located between Pigeon Forge and Gatlinburg in Sky Harbor, this adorable and private one bedroom cabin is the perfect place for a honeymoon or romantic getaway! With accommodations for four, it is also suitable for a small family and is a short drive from the area’s exciting attractions.The spaceFrom the large screened porch, you can take in the magnificent view of the mountains as you relax in the hot tub and listen to the waterfalls and river hidden in the woods below.Take a nap, or cuddle up and read on the comfortable porch swing/bed.Rustic yet romantic, the master bedroom is incredibly spacious with its vaulted cathedral ceiling. It is tastefully decorated to reflect the cabin’s natural surroundings and is furnished with a four poster queen bed. To further enhance the romantic atmosphere, an electric fireplace completes the master bedroom.The bathroom includes a jetted tub and a washer/dryer is provided for your convenience.In the living room, relax by the stone fireplace and pop a movie into the DVD player or log into your favorite streaming service. With vaulted cathedral ceilings, the living/dining area feels open and airy.Prepare a romantic meal in the fully-equipped kitchen or dine out at one of the many area restaurants nearby.Take It Easy is in close proximity to many of the area’s attractions including The Great Smoky Mountains National Park, Cades Cove, Dollywood, Splash Country, Ober Gatlinburg, Ripley's Aquarium of the Smokies, Dixie Stampede, The Island, Tanger Outlet Malls and so much more.Guest accessYou will have the entire cabin to yourselves!Other things to noteThis is a new cabin for us but we have others in the area. Check out our 800+ reviews!
additional_house_rules:
No pets, no smoking, no parties. Must be 21+ to book.

The fireplace is shut down April to beginning of October - it's an area standard!

description: The excitement has now become a reality as you locate the perfectly manicured drive, complete with a split rail fence that guides you along, to your long awaited getaway.   As you walk hand in hand to the steps of Sweet Surrender you are greeted immediately by a view that appears to have been painted just for your arrival. You will first enter the main floor living area that has a full kitchen and the living room. The light shines through the massive windows and lights the space with a warm glow that makes the cathedral ceilings dance with light. There is cozy seating, including a sofa and two recliners, for evenings spent catching up on movies or if you prefer just watching the flames flicker in the stone gas fireplace. The kitchen is fully stocked and houses a table for two. Though a table is provided we recommend the deck table where you are surrounded by crisp mountain air and a 5 star view.   The expansive deck will inevitably become a favorite space for the two of you as you watch the view from the porch swing, with a morning cup of coffee, begin to transform as the hours pass and sunset falls. The hot tub is ready for you to relax and the view is unobstructed from any seat.   The stresses of the world are non-existent as you climb the stairs to your private escape. The two person Jacuzzi has a picture window that frames the view flawlessly and the king size bed provides a perfect vantage point as well. A full bath is available and a flat screen TV completes this retreat.   We invite you to experience Sweet Surrender and as you depart…   May you always walk hand in hand with an abundance of friendship and joy in your hearts. May you weather your sorrows with quiet understanding and a strong foundation. And may you always remember that all is possible when love is given with Sweet Surrender - Kind and True. The light shines through the massive windows and lights the space with a warm glow that makes the cathedral ceilings dance with light. There is cozy seating, including a sofa and two recliners, for evenings spent catching up on movies or if you prefer just watching the flames flicker in the stone gas fireplace. The kitchen is fully stocked and houses a table for two. Though a table is provided we recommend the deck table where you are surrounded by crisp mountain air and a 5 star view.   The expansive deck will inevitably become a favorite space for the two of you as you watch the view from the porch swing, with a morning cup of coffee, begin to transform as the hours pass and sunset falls. The hot tub is ready for you to relax and the view is unobstructed from any seat.   The stresses of the world are non-existent as you climb the stairs to your private escape. The two person Jacuzzi has a picture window that frames the view flawlessly and the king size bed provides a perfect vantage point as well. A full bath is available and a flat screen TV completes this retreat.   We invite you to experience Sweet Surrender and as you depart…   May you always walk hand in hand with an abundance of friendship and joy in your hearts. May you weather your sorrows with quiet understanding and a strong foundation. And may you always remember that all is possible when love is given with Sweet Surrender - Kind and True.

description: Experience the Smoky Mountains in exquisite style at this beautiful 2-bedroom, 2-bath. The authentic private mountain cabin experience comes complete with mountaintop views and a gravel road to match. Only 15 minutes from Pigeon Forge and Gatlinburg with easy access to the parkway, plus GSMNP hiking trails, ‘Moonlight Memories' is a unique home with rustic charm, perfect for a family of 4. Relax in a private hot tub on the open deck overlooking the amazing mountain views.The spaceBedroom 1: King Bed | Bedroom 2 (Loft): Queen Bed | Living Room: Sleeper SofaDrive through the bustling town of Pigeon Forge and through the rich wilderness of the Smoky Mountains as you approach your new home-away-from-home surrounded by towering trees and a sense of peaceful seclusion. You're sure to spend quality time on the spacious deck, where you'll enjoy cookouts on the gas grill, meals al fresco, and stunning mountain views from the private hot tub. Stepping indoors, you're greeted by sleek flooring and an open concept floor plan including a wall of windows which illuminate the wood-paneled interior. You can unwind by getting into the stunning stand alone bath tub overlooking the mountain views or simply watch cable TV, or curl up in front of the stone stacked fireplace with a good book. Kids can stay entertained with a game of Uno or pool on the miniature pool table in the loft, along with an Xbox 360 or even a movie!When hunger strikes, make your way into the kitchen which comes fully equipped with granite countertops and a 3-person breakfast bar. Be sure to take full advantage of the gas grill on the deck or the charcoal grill provided outside. Come bedtime, everyone in your group will have their own space to unwind.  Both the bedroom and bedroom loft with an open-concept layout and no separation from the bath area can comfortably accommodate 4 guests for nights of blissful sleep plus extra sleeping for 2 additional members via the sleeper sofa.Other things to noteKey Residence Features:- Amenities include a fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances, 3 flat-screen cable TVs, complimentary shampoo, private entrance, a MINI pool table, deck with outdoor furniture, a private 4-person hot tub, a gas grill, a wood-burning fireplace, and an XBOX 360 (feel free to bring your own games)- Picturesque Sevierville location - Close to hiking, mountain biking, fishing, horseback riding, distilleries, wineries, shopping, restaurants, Pigeon Forge, Gatlinburg, Dollywood, Ober Gatlinburg, Great Smoky Mountains National Park, and much more! - Nearest Commercial Airport: McGhee Tyson Airport (41 miles)

Additional Information:
- NOTE: The washer and dryer units are portable, compact and camping style. The washer and extra linens are located in the closet next to the lower bedroom
- NOTE: We do NOT offer WiFi at this time, most cell phone providers have good coverage so guests are able to use their own personal hotspots.
- NOTE: The exclusive location of the cabin requires travel using a gravel road for the last half mile, parts of which are single lane with a couple of steep bends
- NOTE: Due to the rain, the gravel road may be rougher in patches, as the gravel does get washed out. The owner does maintain it periodically
- Please remember these are the mountains. Plan your trip accordingly for the weather - in the winter, 4-wheel drive is strongly recommended
- NOTE: Propane for the fire pit may need to be purchased
interaction: Evolve makes it easy to find and book properties you’ll never want to leave. You can relax knowing that our properties will always be ready for you and that we’ll answer the phone 24/7. Even better, if anything is off about your stay, we’ll make it right. You can count on our homes and our people to make you feel welcome--because we know what vacation means to you.

description: Lookout Loft is a brand new luxurious cabin with mountain views that you've been dreaming of! Our cabin is located just 3 miles to downtown Gatlinburg. Designed with a 'slow' pace in mind. Our hope is that you enjoy every part of your stay at our cabin; from enjoying your morning cup of coffee to curling up by the fire as the sun sets over the mountains. Our cabin is a cozy place for friends and family to gather for a memorable stay in the mountains!The space+ Master Suite with King Bed + Master Bath with Dual Vanity and Large Walk-In Shower+ Upstairs Bedroom with King Bed+ Loft Bedroom with Queen Bed and Mountain Views+ Additional Queen Sleeper Sofa+ Upstairs Full Bathroom + Fully Equipped Kitchen+ Gas Fireplace+ Two Large Porches with Hot Tub and Mountain Views+ Outside Fire Pit with Seating+ High Speed WiFi and Cable TVThree bedrooms, two bathrooms, and an additional pullout queen sleeper sofa located throughout the 2 spacious levels, "Lookout Loft" accommodates 8 comfortably. When you enter the cabin you will notice large windows on both levels that show stunning views of Mt. Leconte. This cabin offers modern and upscale features that you will notice throughout your stay! It is ideal for couples, families, & friends looking for a mountain getaway. Lookout Loft offers guests seclusion without being far from the area attractions!The main level features the master suite, living room with gas fireplace, laundry room, and a well equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances, coffee maker, and a dining table that seats 8. There is also a spacious deck off the main level that is the perfect place to spend a quiet morning drinking a cup of coffee or enjoying a glass of wine in the evening. You will also find a hot tub on this deck and access to the outdoor fire pit and seating area that overlooks the mountains.The second level features a bedroom, full bathroom, and a loft that acts as the third bedroom that all have views of the mountains. There is also a small seating area and a game table located in the loft. Walk out to the second deck to soak in the mountain views as you look at Mt. Leconte.Guest accessThe entire cabin is yours while you stay with us! Within 24 hours of booking, a rental agreement will be sent to you. A Welcome Package with detailed information including address and directions will be sent one week prior to your travel date.Other things to noteLookout Loft is a brand new cabin that was completed in January 2020. Check us out on our Instagram! @lookoutloft

description: Lovers’ Hideaway isn’t just for lovers. Yes, the cabin offers romantic amenities such as a king-size bed and a jetted tub in the primary suite, an outdoor hot tub on the wraparound lower deck, a stacked-stone wood-burning fireplace, and a private balcony where you can gaze up at the stars. But because Lovers’ Hideaway also has a queen-size sofa bed, 2 full bathrooms, a pool table, and an arcade table, you can easily bring the kids along for a family vacation. You can even bring your pets! All four legged friends are welcome.  Situated on a ridge amid stately trees. Lovers’ Hideaway offers plenty of privacy. Yet it’s surprisingly close to restaurants, shops, and attractions. Downtown Gatlinburg, for instance, is only 10 minutes away, and you can drive to the Great Smoky Mountains National Park, the Great Smoky Arts & Crafts Community, and Dollywood, among other destinations, in less than a half-hour. What’s more, when you stay here in the summer, you’ll have free access to 3 nearby pool areas where you can swim, laze on a poolside chaise, and play ping-pong, shuffleboard, and other games.  However, you don’t have to leave Lovers’ Hideaway to have a great time. Atop the living room fireplace is a 42’ HDTV with cable; you can watch a movie while snuggling on the luxe leather sofa. There’s a full-size pool table just behind the couch; like many of the cabin’s other furnishings, it was crafted from logs, giving it a rustic elegance that beautifully complements the wood-planked walls and floor. If the pool’s not your game, sit down at the arcade table—though if you’re vacationing with the kids, they may have beaten you to it.  Thanks to Lovers’ Hideaway’s convenient location, there are scores of restaurants nearby, offering just about every type of cuisine you can imagine. Sometimes, though, it’s more relaxing to dine in. Fortunately the kitchen is equipped with all the appliances, gadgets, cookware, and tableware you could need, no matter how elaborate a meal you have in mind. Go ahead, surf the web using the free WIFI service. You may even find a recipe you’d never have time to make at home. There’s a park-style charcoal grill outside as well—perfect if you reel in some trout from one of the nearby streams. Plus a dishwasher to make cleanup a snap. The dining table can seat up to 6 people, and after the plates are cleared it makes a great game table.  The primary suite is upstairs; in fact, it makes up the entire loft level. Like the rest of Lovers’ Hideaway, it boasts lustrous wooden floors, and artful log-style furnishings. Before you retire to the sumptuous king-size bed—perhaps to watch a romantic movie on the 32” TV—you can luxuriate in the suite’s jetted tub. If a long soak among its pulsating jets of steamy water doesn’t put you in the mood for romance, a nightcap out on the loft’s private balcony will. Sit back on the rocking chairs with a glass of wine and gaze up at the twinkling stars as crickets chirp and owls hoot—it’s a magical experience you’ll long remember.  In addition to a jetted tub, the primary suite has a full bathroom with a walk-in shower. A 2nd full bathroom, with a combination shower/tub, is on the main floor, which is especially convenient if you’ve brought the kids along. We’ll provide plenty of clean towels and bedding, so you don’t have to load up your suitcase with your own linens from home. In fact, you can pack extra light, as Lovers’ Hideaway includes a washer and dryer.  Whether you’re coming to Gatlinburg for romance or family fun, Lovers’ Hideaway is a charming, perfectly located cabin to serve as your home base. So book your stay today—we look forward to seeing you! Other things to noteLovers’ Hideaway isn’t just for lovers. description: "Gatlin Cove" is the ideal vacation getaway for those who desire convenience AND luxurious cabin charm. Our beautiful one-bedroom, two-bath cabin (sleeps 6) is located in the gorgeous Gatlinburg Falls, which is just minutes from all the best attractions, restaurants, and activities the Smokies has to offer! With cathedral wood ceilings, multiple fireplaces, a steamy hot tub and views of the natural hills, relaxation begins the minute you step into Gatlin Cove. Easy access with no scary roads!The spaceNestled in one of the most sought-after resorts in the Smokies, our cabin brings serenity, convenience and fun, all combined in one.  This spacious cabin is perfectly designed for both the honeymooners and small families alike. With a spacious master bedroom, heart shaped jacuzzi tub, relaxing outdoor hot tub, pool table, foosball table, arcade, community pool, and multiple outdoor decks for taking in the surroundings, you and your loved ones and friends will have plenty of amenities to enjoy.★ Living RoomGatlin Cove's living room is designed for both entertainment and relaxation. You'll find a large smart TV that is situated above the fireplace for cozy nights, and a plush leather couch so you can watch a movie, read a book, or warm up while chatting about your daily adventures in the Smokies.★ Kitchen and DiningMeals are an important aspect of every vacation, and while the area offers a multitude of restaurants for every culinary craving, if you never want to leave the house to eat, you certainly don't have to! Gatlin Cove offers a fully equipped kitchen complete with everything you need to prepare your own farm-to-table meal, including a standard size refrigerator, oven, stove, toaster, pots, pans, and cutleries. With an open design, stainless steel appliances, and plenty of counterspace, there's room to whip up a meal and enjoy it right here in the comfort of your own cabin. The dining area is situated right off the kitchen area, with a wooden table and bench large enough to gather and enjoy your meals comfortably.★ Bedroom, Bathroom and More!You will never feel cramped here at Gatlin Cove. The master bedroom and bathroom are both spacious and have plenty of room to relax and are located on the first floor. Whether you are napping in the king-sized bed, watching TV in the bedroom, or enjoying the fireplace that is nestled close by, relaxation awaits you!  The living room also has a full-sized sleeper sofa, which is perfect for your guests (or kiddos!) that tag along, along with a Queen size futon upstairs in the loft. And you can pack light, because the bathroom contains towels and starter soaps, shampoos, toilet paper, and other bathroom essentials.★ Activities and EntertainmentWhile relaxation and comfort abound throughout Gatlin Cove, the upstairs loft was designed for family fun! If hours of competition between rounds of pool, foosball games or arcade competitions don't keep you busy enough, more fun awaits you outdoors. You and your guests can relax in the private hot tub, cook up dinner on the outside grill, or take a stroll to the community outdoor seasonal pool for a daytime dip. And to wind down your day, enjoy a hot cup of tea (or moonshine!) while relaxing on the upstairs porch swing and taking in the sights and sounds of the Smokies.★ The NeighborhoodThe Smokies is an incredible place to visit. Our cabin is ideally located in the gorgeous Gatlinburg Falls resort, where you're immersed in nature and serenity but only minutes from the main attractions of Gatlinburg.  After stepping outside of the cabin, you are only a couple of minutes from the nearby shops, restaurants, museums and hiking trails. It's a great place to be, and amazing in every sense of the word!★COUPONS AND DISCOUNTS★Shortly before you arrive I'll send you a coupon book with dozens and dozens of discounts for all of the top attractions in the area.  This includes the best dinner shows, pancake restaurants, adventure parks, museums and even an exotic animal park.  If you want inspiration for your vacation activities, this will definitely give you enough for your visit!★COOL THINGS TO DO IN THE AREA★Pigeon Forge, Gatlinburg and Sevierville are the three main cities that comprise the area.  Everything is spread out a bit and there are amazing things to keep you busy...- World class hiking trails of all types and skill levels- Dollywood theme park (of course!)- Putt putt, go karts and pancake restaurants on every corner- Amazing dinner shows to entertain kids of all ages- Museums of all types:  classic cars, Alcatraz, Titanic and several childrens' museums- Restaurants of all types... Always come hungry because serving sizes are HUGE!
additional_house_rules:
Adults renters must be over the age of 25. Guests under the age of 21 must be accompanied by parents and/or adults over the age of 25. For security purposes, please provide a copy of your photo ID within 48 hours of booking or we reserve the right to cancel.

Any pets or extra people brought to the cabin are a rules violation and will result in an extra charge of $500 and immediate removal with no refund.  

WAIVER OF LIABILITY: You understand use of hot tub is at your own risk and that special risks may be involved in using the hot tub. You accept full responsibility for any bodily injury arising from use of the hot tub and hold owner harmless. You understand there are potential dangers that the hot tub may present to children who are not carefully supervised, as well as the danger to any person using the hot tub, or if a person has health risks, or if a person uses the hot tub while intoxicated or using any kind of drugs or medication, or uses the hot tub if pregnant.
interaction: We provide support generally via the app/this web site and phone support is there for emergencies. Expect a prompt response.Contact us now so we can begin arranging your perfect vacation!
transit: We strongly recommend you come with your car as that will give you the freedom to explore and enjoy the beautiful Smoky Mountains area. As you already know, we offer free parking spots.You generally won’t need to have 4wd for the cabin as the roads are well maintained.

description: Fireplace turned on Oct 1 and off on  March 31 ( no exceptions).Our cabins name is Valeria's Beary Tale. It is perfect for  honeymoons/anniversaries or a small family . Hottub,  Jaccuzi tub, Wifi, , 1 Queen bedroom, sleeper sofa,  kitchen, Outdoor swinging  Glider, fireplace ( seasonal).Because of the size of our cabin we only allow  either  2 adults/ 2 kids or 3 adults maximum. We don't allow 4 adults. Rental agreement is sent  after booking and needs to be signed 72 hrs after booking.The spaceFireplace turned on Oct 1 and off on  March 31 ( no exceptions).Our cabins name is Valeria's Beary Tale. It is perfect for  honeymoons/anniversaries or a small family.  The cabin has its  privacy and is surrounded by forest  ,  has hottub,  jacuzzi in bedroom,  WiFi, kitchen, 1 Queen  Bedroom, sleeper sofa, Outdoor Swinging  Glider, the  fireplace only seasonal. Because of the size of our cabin ( 550 sqft)  we only allow  either  2 adults/ 2 kids or 3 adults maximum. We don't allow 4 adults. Rental agreement is sent  after booking and needs to be signed 72 hrs after booking. This is for insurance purposes only.Guest accessENTIRE CABIN FOR THEMSELVES. Because of the topographic terrain of Gatlinburg/ Pigeon Forge many cabins with beautiful views or just a mountain setting are located in very steep roads which is very common for this area. Our cabin is located at the top of Sky Harbor ( Top of the Mountain)  and it has a nice flat driveway. Going up it will be 2 miles up the mountain and it does have some curvy roads which is the norm to this area of Tennessee.Other things to noteDo I need a 4WD or AWD to your cabin? . Although all roads are paved and maintained by the private HOA, it is not uncommon that in late fall , winter and early spring to have hazard road conditions. We recommend that if the weather says it will snow or have Ice Showers to have a four-wheel drive and/or chains. If the weather is nice then you do not need it. We provide a video showing ride to the cabin once paid in full. 4WD and chains is only needed if there is hazardous conditions. We do not provide video unless you are a booked guest.
additional_house_rules:
SIGNED RENTAL AGREEMENT - Please keep in mind once you book we will email our customized rental agreement.Our rental agreement contains specific information relevant to our rental. The agreement also contains details that are useful as you plan your visit. Since we couldn't fit all our agreement here on this section we require for a signature. 

KEYCODE:  Keycode is automatic and will be sent to the guests phone number 1 or 2 days before check-in.

CHECK-IN TIME: 4:00 p.m ( Eastern Time).  No early check-in. Please do not arrive early unless authorized by us.  Automatic  Key-code will not work until 4 pm. If you attempt to check-in earlier the key-code won't work. 95% of the time we have guests  checking out the same day you check-in which leaves barely enough time for cleaners to have cabin ready before 4 pm. 

Each one of our guests will receive a text message the day of their arrival confirming cabin is ready for check-in. 



Check-out time is by 10:00 a.m.  Please be prepared to be out by 10:00, as most of the time, the cabin has to be cleaned and prepared for another guest arriving that same day. 

FIREPLACE: Please keep in mind that the fireplace is only seasonal (  during winter season) . The Fireplace is turned on Oct 1 and turned off on March 30
 ( no exceptions). Hotels in the area and other cabins owners turn them off on March 1. We are of the few owners who leave fireplace until March 30. Per Fire Code all Fireplaces in the area should be turned off on March 1. 
The fireplace  will only be on between these dates so if your dates are not in  between those dates please don't request for us to put it on because a special technician has  to connect it and to disconnect it. 


CANCELLATIONS: Cancellations affect owners significantly. If you are not sure because of medical conditions, work permission or because road conditions we strongly suggest “Purchasing travel insurance”.  It's very important you know that when you booked our cabin you are booking directly with AIRBNB cancellation policies and not ours. Refunds are for which  whatever policy you read at the moment of booking. Normally you have a grace period of 48hrs once booked to cancel and receive 100% refund. If you cancel past that frame you will  only receive 50% refund. If you cancel 7 days before checking-in you won't receive a refund. 

SMOKING: This is a NON SMOKING cabin. No Electronic cigarettes! Smoking outside is permitted, but if smoke odor is detected inside the cabin or any evidence of smoking there will be an additional charge of $150 to pay for odor abatement, cleaning and sanitizing. 

PETS:  We do not allow pets of any kind in our cabin. If pets are found to be in the cabin or any evidence of pets, Guests will be subject to eviction and loss of all money paid, plus a cleaning fee of $150 to cover carpet and furniture cleaning and flea prevention measures. Sorry, but many of our guests are allergic to animals plus our cabin is intended mostly for honeymooners and anniversaries and we don’t want to risk the possibility of pet odors in our cabin. 

KEY CODE & ADDRESS
1 or 2 days before checking-in the keycode will be sent to  your cellphone, so please keep phone updated. 
Once you send us the signed rental agreement that we send via email once booked we will send an email with address and videos showing the ride to the cabin. 

OCCUPANCY:

Maximum Occupancy: 4 – No exceptions
Our cabin is a small cabin and there is not enough accommodation for more than 2 Adults/ 2 children or maximum 3 adults. 4 Adults will not be allowed. 
 If evidence is found that more than the approved number of guests has stayed in the cabin without permission, additional charges will incur. 

DAMAGE: VERY IMPORTANT!!!!!!!!
Guests agree to leave the property in the same condition they found it upon arrival.  If property is not left in the same condition, the Guests understand, and agree that management reserves the right to charge the Guests for any repairs or additional cleaning.  Since we do not charge a Damage Deposit, we expect Guests to help with the upkeep of keeping the cabin the way you found it.  If you break something, please claim responsibility and call, email or text us for a replacement to be made.  
If linens are lost or severely damaged you will be charged at current retail value and this goes for anything that goes missing. 

MOUNTAIN ROADS
Most roads in the area are well maintained, but some are curvy because of the topography of the mountains. The roads at SKY Harbor are paved and maintained routinely although in late fall, winter and early spring it is not uncommon to occasionally have hazardous road conditions if it has snowed or if frozen ice showers have fallen. It is recommended that during late fall and winter have a four-wheel drive and /or chains. You are responsible for your transportation. We cannot provide transportation nor are we responsible for any towing charges you may incur during your stay.  

WILD LIFE
While the cabins are sprayed monthly for pests, wasps, ladybugs and other insects sometimes these creatures still find their way indoors.  Remember that we are in the Great Smoky Mountains and sometimes we have these unwanted guests. While we cannot make refund for insects or wildlife encounters, should it arise, we will take the appropriate measures to correct the problem. Remember this is not your common back yard as such you are likely to encounter a Bear, Deer, Turkey, Bats, Ladybugs, Carpenter Bees, Wasps, Scorpions, Ticks, Chiggers. 
Sometimes, a bear may wonder from the National Park to one of the cabins. Please DO NOT approach a bear; do not feed any animal as the owners will not accept responsibility for any injury or illness caused by wildlife. Refunds are not given due to insect or animal issues. Always keep an eye on the children on the outdoors.
Please do not take lightly the possibility of a bear in the area, if you have children please do not leave unattended playing outside. 
FEEDING THE ANIMALS OR NOT SECURING YOUR TRASH CAN RESULT IN BODILY INJURY.


POWER OUTRAGES
Sometimes in the mountains we experience power outages. If the power goes out then the well will stop working as well. You will not have water until the power comes back on. A well requires electricity to work. Having an extra gallon of water on hand is always a good idea. You can at least have something to drink or wash your hands. Flushing the toilet also requires water. Being prepared can make the difference. If you do experience a power outage, contact Sevier County Electric System at (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN). 

ITEMS LEFT BEHIND
Owners are not responsible for any items left behind and do not offer shipping of any kind unless guest wants to pay a $35 trip fee that our cleaners charge to go get your things plus shipping fee. It is illegal to ship prescription drugs so double check every spot before you leave the cabin.  

NO DAILY MAID SERVICE- While linens, bath towels and a starter kit are included in the cabin; daily maid service is not included in your rental rate. You may want to bring extra of everything. Keep in mind we are not a hotel and we are only owners renting you our home to you. 

WHAT WE PROVIDE: A starter kit with the following items: 
*1 roll of toilet paper per bathroom, 1 roll paper towel, 2 laundry detergent pods, 2 dishwashing pods,    dishwashing soap and 1 body soap. 
*Sheets for beds.
*2 pillows per bed.
*1 blanket per bed.
* 4 Towels, 4 hand towels and washcloths for bathroom use only.
*Dishtowels and dishcloths for kitchen use only. 
*Trash bags.
*Dishes, silverware, pots and pans.
*Iron and ironing board.
WHAT YOU NEED TO BRING:
*Extra toilet paper, if needed.
*Towels for hot tub.
*Laundry detergent for your own belongings.
*Extra blankets, if needed.
*Extra pillows, if needed.
*Soap/body wash for bathing.
*Shampoo.
*Food.
*Charcoal for grill.


HEAT AND AIR CONTROLS:
Please do not close all the vents.  Instead, adjust the thermostat. If the vents are all closed, the unit has to work harder and may go out.


MAINTENANCE:
We do not guarantee that appliances, amenities or utilities will not fail during your stay, but we do guarantee that repairs will be made as soon as possible.  Guests understand and agree that there are circumstances beyond our control and that no recourse or action can be brought against owners for these circumstances.

Unless the service request is deemed an emergency by the owner, maintenance will respond during normal business hours of 9am- 5pm. However, owners will agree to do all that is humanly possible to remedy any issue as quickly as possible. 

Please understand that we strive to make all our guests happy. However, we cannot send our cleaning team after hours to change a light bulb, clean dust, or get a spider web. These types of complaints can wait.  If a complaint is found to be frivolous or non-existing a $35 trip fee will apply.  

HOT TUBS:
USE OF THE HOT TUB IS AT YOUR OWN DISCRETION AND RISK.
Hot tubs are cleaned and refilled after every guest.  Please do not put any items such as soap, bath products, etc. into hot tub, as it damages the equipment. .  Do not stand or sit on hot tub covers, they will break and you may be charged for replacement. Place cover after every use.  Do not jump into hot tubs.  Hot tubs are not intended to be “swimming pools” and children are NOT to be in the hot tubs, for safety reasons.

There is no life guard on duty to supervise!  Do not turn the hot tubs off, as it takes several hours for them to reheat.  Hot tubs will run on a cycle of circulating the water, so it will appear to be “off” at times, but it is still on.



EXCESSIVE MESS: VERY IMPORTANT!!!!
Please use paper towels to clean up spills and not the cabin washcloths and/or towels. ZERO tolerance policy for house parties. House parties requiring damage or soiling will require an extensive cleaning fee and you will be charged for it. All damage will be documented with pictures.
interaction: We provide an exceptional communication with our guests. We check with our guests before arrival/during arrival and mid-stay  via text phone to make sure everything is good.  Guests can call, text , email 24/7 if anything arises or if they have any questions. Our cleaners are locals so if anything arises they will be available for any need between 9am-5pm ( business hours) unless it's an emergency like heat/ AC or mayor appliance we will try our best to get our techs on the way before or after business hours. We answer all questions less than 1 hour and if we don't respond right away please consider we might be at a doctors office, at work, driving or doing something that doesn't allow us to take a call. We will return calls as soon as possible.
transit: Sky Harbor Resort  is nestled between Gatlinburg & Pigeon Forge right off the Spur! It's in the middle of both towns , all the attractions and National Park.It is a 5-10 min' drive from either town, you cannot ask for a better location.So what is the Spur? The Spur is the road that connects Pigeon Forge and Gatlinburg. It refers to the 5 mile stretch that cuts through the Great Smoky Mountain National Park.Our Resort has 2 entrances. Front entrance is the most common one through the SPUR and the back one through back roads. You chose either one to enter from. We send 2 videos of the ride up the mountain once paid in full.

description: MOUNTAIN COMFORT is the perfect romantic getaway for all couples! This PRIVATE, beautifully decorated cabin is all on one level with a purely magnificent panoramic VIEW of the mountains! This cabin has everything to completely spoil  any place you've ever stayed before!!Receive $555 worth of tickets for each nights stay. View photo #2 for more infoThe spaceEnjoy the mountain view from the RED HEART shaped jacuzzi with mirror background or from the fabulous 2016 Artesian Spas HOT TUB with many powerful jets and multicolor LED lights located on the private covered deck. View the large stack stone fireplace & red heart shaped jacuzzi from the king size bed. Comcast Xfinity high speed WIFI. 2017 Samsung 4K TV connected to WiFi with Netflix and other apps.  Upgraded Digital Cable with music channels, Blu Ray player with over 40 BluRays/DVD’s to choose from. Stereo & CD player.Fully equipped kitchen with all 2016 APPLIANCES (dishwasher, microwave, stove and refrigerator with ice maker). GRANITE COUNTER TOPS in the kitchen. The kitchen is exceptionally well stocked...a wonderful kitchen, complete with Dunkin' Donuts Coffee for your enjoyment as well as a new Keurig provided along with a rack of various coffees and drinks to choose from. We also provide salt/pepper and other spices, as well as aluminum foil and plastic wrap. We provide high quality cookware, elegant dishes and plentiful utensils. Stack washer and dryer is located in the bathroom. Decorative soap dispensers are filled with liquid hand soap at every sink. Kleenex, QUALITY toilet tissue and quality paper towels are provided. Shampoo, conditioner , body soap and a hair dryer is located in the bathroom vanity. Individually wrapped make-up removers provided as well. Biltmore 610 thread count luxury sheets and Designer (Donna Sharp) quilt comforter and shams top the comfy king bed. Plenty of extra pillows and soft fleece and down filled blankets. Tongue and groove pine make up the interior walls and cathedral ceiling of this cabin. Night lights to light your way. M&M dispenser and a candy dish filled with various Dove Chocolates and Tootsie Pops to satisfy your sweet tooth. Our cabin is convenient to all of the local attractions, the arts & crafts community, horseback riding, hiking, shopping, restaurants and the Gatlinburg Community Center which offers an indoor pool, bowling, tennis, aerobics, and racquet ball. A charcoal grill is provided (you will need charcoal and lighter fluid). A lighter is provided in the kitchen. New 2017 KitchenAid 2 burner gas grill is also available on the front porch. The cabin is exceptionally well maintained and cleaned! I decorate the table with seasonal place mats and napkins.I even have 2 sets of telescopic hiking poles for you to borrow if you decide to venture out on a trail. Well lit parking is level and just steps from the entry door.This is not your basic cabin! We live here and care for and maintain our cabin unlike absent owners who visit occasionally. Our cabin is exceptionally maintained and supplied with items that most homeowners never even think of. You will be astounded with the amenities here and the decor and personal touch and care given!Guest accessGuests will have access to the entire cabin.Other things to noteMountain Comfort Cabin Rentals prides itself in providing you the best experience during your stay. As a thank you for staying with us you will receive complimentary admissions to popular local attractions every day. Enjoy our easy-to-use activity site powered by Xplorie that includes local activity information and quick access to our live Destination Guides who can book your activities and answer any questions you may have. You will receive tickets to 11 attractions every day of your stay including check-out day.Ziplining at Legacy Mountain $119Dollywood $84 x 4Horseback Riding at 5 Oaks Stables $54.99Dollywood's Splash Country $54.95Whitewater Rafting with Big Creek Expeditions $46.95Country Tonite Music Show $41.50Titanic $35Paula Deen's Lumberjack Feud $34.99Anakessta $32.99Wonderworks $32.99Rocky Top Mountain Coaster $18Daily value $555.36

description: Relax... Take a deep breath... You're at the cabin now. Life is good at the cabin! Nestled among the mountains & trees is A Leconte Lookout, a lovely all wood log cabin overlooking the Great Smoky Mountains National Park. The Master Loft Bedroom is a dreamy oasis with a King bed, rustic hewn beams above & a Jacuzzi tub. Downstairs enjoy the lovely living room and kitchen, pool table, & the deck with Hot Tub & TV, not to mention the gorgeous VIEWS! Easy drive, no steep roads, close to everything!The space** Our cabin is very has great mountain views and is close to all you need. Keycode entry means you don't have to meet anyone to check in. Come here to get away and enjoy the mountain air. **fast wifi Roku, DisneyPlus, Hulu, ESPN and more appspool tablehot tubwhirlpool tub w/viewfull kitchenwasher & dryer3 flatscreen tv’sgas fireplacecharcoal grillking bedsleep sofaadditional sleeping arrangementskey code door lock (flexible check in time)early check in available for a small feepre-arrival services available upon requestUpon arriving at the cabin, which boasts easy access (no steep winding roads) and ample level parking, you will step up onto the covered front porch.  As you enter the cabin, the woody scent of the knotty pine and the views from the windows welcome you to your Smoky Mountain retreat.Delight in the comfort and coziness of the family room; with its comfortable seating, sleep sofa, lovely fireplace, and charming mountain decor. The cooks among you will enjoy our well equipped kitchen which is open to the family room and our outdoor grill.As an added bonus you can unwind in the steaming hot tub on the back deck while admiring the beautiful views. Enjoy the peace of this glorious spot as you admire Mt. Leconte.  Waking up to the mountains every morning will never disappoint. The view from any room in the house is great, especially from the Master Loft bedroom’s King bed. With rustic hewn beams soaring above you, the mountains around you and in the neighboring room its own private Jacuzzi beckoning from beneath the sloped ceiling, it is a delightful world of your own.The cabin is in a prime location, situated 2 minutes drive from the Gatlinburg Arts and Craft Community, and only minutes away from Pigeon Forge and the new Rocky Top Sports Complex. There's even a trolley stop 2 minutes walking distance from the cabin!When you return from your day of excursions our cabin is a wonderful oasis for you to enjoy and socialize. Envision coming home to the cabin after experiencing the beauty and splendor of the Great Smoky Mountains. The glow of the fireplace casts a dreamlike ambiance. Surrounded by your friends and loved ones, you sip hot chocolate or your favorite refreshment while you reminisce, laugh, and reconnect. This is where memories are made. We want our cabin to be a place for you to relax, rejuvenate, and renew your spirit. This is your vacation. With you in mind we designed A Leconte Lookout  as an affordable and comfortable retreat. We’ve included modern amenities so that your experience will be carefree and enjoyable.Guest accessGuests will have the entire cabin to themselves.
additional_house_rules:
If you are local to TN, you are not allowed to instant book. You must reach out for our written permission first.
If you are under 25 you need to reach out for permission first before booking.

Thank you very much for following our cabin's house rules:
Please leave the place how you found it. Damage or additional cleaning above average may incur additional charge.  
-no smoking, hookah etc. Fees are charged for smoke removal or fire damage.
-Hot tub cover must be secured by cable after use to avoid blowing away. Please no soaps/oils in the hot tub. 
-Kitchen sink doesn't have garbage disposal so please put food scraps in trash can.
-Do not move the charcoal grill onto chalet decks. Leave it on the front parking/overlook area.  For fire safety reasons this is a city of Gatlinburg requirement for all cabins and chalets. 
(If children are present: they must be supervised near railings on decks/water/tubs/fireplace. You are responsible for your children's safety. This is not a child proofed cabin.) 

Thank you, and wishing you a wonderful vacation! :)
interaction: I will be available by text, phone and email during your stay. Feel free to reach out if you need anything.

description: Sits atop Chalet Village at Ski Mountain. Perfect for a romantic getaway or a small family. Relax on the back deck or Hot tub for bear watching, the lights of Gatlinburg, and the visits of birds, squirrels, and other animals. Features mountain views and a private setting only 3.7 miles from Gatlinburg, easy access to Pigeon Forge. The clubhouse features pools, tennis, shuffleboard, gym, & game room. You will be driving up steep and winding roads for 15 minutes, but it will be worth it!The spaceThere are a few steps to get to the entrance of the Cabin. The cabin is one floor only consisting of an open space plan. The Kitchen will have the essentials for cooking, there is a 4 table dining area followed by the living space which has a wood burning fireplace (wood not supplied) and TV and half bath around the corner. The Master bedroom has a jacuzzi tub separate from the master bath which has a shower.Other things to noteWe welcome your furry pets in our chalet. Please protect furniture with the available blanket.We ask that you do not leave food outside and please DO NOT feed the bears.Must be 21 Years or older to book.

description: Welcome to Lover's Escape -Located only 1.2 miles from downtown Gatlinburg.  Nothing but forest behind our cabin that goes all the way to the GSMNP! Relax in the outdoor hot tub & look at the twinkling stars of the Smoky Mountain sky.  Or, if it is too cold outside, retreat to the Jacuzzi inside and enjoy the ambiance of the 50” electric fireplace  We are very close to the action of Gatlinburg & not too far from Pigeon Forge either!  Fiber WiFi, washer/dryer, charcoal grill.The spaceWe are back! New construction completed in late 2017 after the cabin burnt in 2016 wildfire...Designed specifically for couples, we welcome you to escape from normal life to a vacation home tucked away in the Roaring Fork section of Gatlinburg in Forest Springs. We are slightly over a mile to downtown Gatlinburg, yet enough in the woods that bears sometimes walk by...Smart access to TV is available when you want to be plugged in to the world, but when you turn the TV off is when you will really enjoy our cabin.  A king sized bed crafted from reclaimed lumber with a new memory foam mattress invites you to sleep in and relax.  A hot tub on the private back deck welcomes you to relax and check out the night skyline.  If it is too cold outside, retreat inside to the couple sized corner whirlpool. Enjoy dancing firelight from our newly installed 50” electric fireplace. We have a full kitchen and a charcoal park style grill for those nights you want to stay in. Handcrafted doors, a pine interior and hickory floors are warm and welcoming! Escape with your special someone to our cabin!* If you are traveling with another couple, we have an almost identical cabin located fairly close by called Southern Nights. It is also listed on Airbnb! https://abnb.me/EVmg/v2nIBIJDhIoGuest accessEntire cabin, porches and yard except for storage closet above the bathroom. The hot water heater is located up there.Other things to noteOur Business Tax License # is 8657No check in or out on Thanksgiving or Christmas Day.Our TV is a smart TV with Netflix and Amazon Videos included.  We also have DVD’s.We are pet free as our daughter is allergic to them!** there is not a landline phone here!We are a studio cabin. The bedroom is in the main cabin not a separate room.  We are perfect for honeymooners or couples looking for an intimate getaway!  or small families looking for quality family time together...Beds/Baths: One King Bed in the main room, One bathroom with tub and shower.  Jacuzzi  in main room as well. We are decorated for Fall and Christmas!Due to sometimes inclement weather in the winter, we recommend travel insurance, which we do have a source for obtaining.REPAIRS & SERVICE CALLS: We take pride in maintaining our cabin & perform regular maintenance to keep everything in good working order. It is impossible, however, to guarantee that all appliances, hot tub, fireplaces, etc., will be in working order 100% of the time. We will, however, make every effort to correct any problem you encounter during your stay as soon as possible. Non-emergency maintenance issues will be handled during normal business hours. If you need emergency maintenance, please contact us on the numbers on your confirmation.  While we will attempt to correct all issues as quickly as possible, no refunds will be made for mechanical failures of hot tub, appliances/electronics, or interruption/loss of utilities (including satellite TV), etc. Authorized repairmen have the right to enter the property to accomplish needed repairs even if the service call was made prior to your arrival.  Thanks in advance for your understanding.

name: Honeysuckle Hideaway - Most Romantic cabin on MTN

description: Transport yourself to your own private hideaway on the top of the mountain. Romantically nestled in the woods, this authentic log cabin is located half way between Gatlinburg (6mi) & Pigeon Forge (5mi) this studio cabin has a full kitchen, wood burning fireplace, jacuzzi tub, private outdoor jacuzzi, luxurious king bed and roku TV. Escape to your own slice of rustic paradise, surrounded by the stunning peace and beauty of the Great Smoky MountainsThe space“Honeysuckle Hideaway” is designed as a romantic and cozy getaway for couples young and old. Relax, unwind and make lasting memories with the one you love!  You can enjoy apparent seclusion all while being with 15 mins of the main attractions in both Gatlinburg and Pigeon Forge. The cabin is located at the top of persimmon mountain at the end of a private road with only 4 other small cabins. Smell the flowers, listen to the birds chirp and enjoy a strong chance to witness the magic of a momma bear and her cubs wondering the area. We are also easy to get to on back roads which can be very handy as a way to avoid the bumper to bumper traffic on the parkway.The cabin is located on top of a private road. We are in a very limited signal area and rely on Viperbroadband for WiFI and Roku TV streaming. WIFI can be spotty and is slower than off the mountain. If you do plan to work or are in need of phone service at all times while in the cabin it would be wise to book elsewhere. Honeysuckle hideaway is for those wanting to unplug and enjoy the mountains.  Cellular service can be iffy so it is recommended you connect to WiFi calling once you reach the cabin. We are a true mountain log cabin and the majority of cabins in the area do not provide internet but we are providing the best available for us at this time. **NOTE: the last 1/4 mile to the cabin is on a gravel road, there is a curve which does require a three point turn half way up (please see pictures in listing for images of the road and sharp left turn). The vast majority of our guests have no issues at all with the driveway and to us it is part of the mountain experience, however if you are uncomfortable with driving on an inclined gravel road this is not the cabin for you. If you are looking for a true couples' mountain getaway we cannot wait to host you!Guest accessKeypad for easy self check in
