description: Welcome to Stream of Love! This newly renovated 1br/1ba cabin is situated in a small development directly in between Pigeon Forge and Gatlinburg TN! It features new finishes such as granite countertops and slate gray appliances. Its stylish, simple decor make this a cozy place to escape for a mountain getaway. The property has creek front access! Enjoy the rockers on the front porch. Only 6 miles to downtown Gatlinburg and 6 miles to Dollywood!The spaceBedroom 1- King bed, TVBathroom- Tub/Shower comboLiving Room- Queen sleeper sofa, TV, gas fireplaceKitchen- Slate gray, granite countertops, pots/pans, Keurig and normal coffee maker (bring coffee)Covered Back Porch-Hot TubCovered Front Porch- seatingCreek accessGuest accessPaved roads and parking available at the cabin. The cabin features paved roads and without any inclement weather any car should be fine but again, we recommend 4x4 wheel drive when visiting the area.Gas fireplaces are seasonal and operate around October-March give or take depending on the weather.We DO NOT provide cooking oil. Some things are out of our control, if an amenity quits working during your stay, we will work to fix it as quickly as possible. description: Frequent bear sightings. Adults & kids all love the 4 player arcade with over 3,000 popular games. Private 6 person hot tub. Cozy electric fireplace. 2 smart TVs with HBO. Furnished kitchen & washer/dryer. Rocking chairs to enjoy the outdoors. Bunk beds. Living room features a memory foam queen pull out bed. Located just 1.5 miles from downtown Gatlinburg and 3 miles from Rocky Top Sports World, you are sure to make many wonderful memories. Lower unit of a duplex. Professional cleaning service.
additional_house_rules:
NOISE
This is the lower unit of a duplex. Please be considerate to those above you and refrain from making excessive noise. If excessive noise complaints are received, you may be asked to leave.

NO SMOKING
This is a NON SMOKING property. If you smoke inside the home you will be charged $250, plus the increase in cleaning fee, plus any damages.

NO PARTIES
If you plan to party, please do not book this property.

NO PETS
Pets are NOT allowed. If you sneak in a pet of any kind you will be charged an additional $250 and you will be asked to leave.

MAXIMUM OCCUPANCY 
Maximum Permitted Occupancy is 6. Exceeding the maximum permitted occupancy will result in a fine by both local authorities and a $250 fine by the host. You will also be asked to leave.

HOT TUB
The hot tub is drained, cleaned, and refilled after every guest! If you plan to use the hot tub, we recommend checking the temp as soon as you arrive. Temperature increases slowly, so keep lid on until your optimal temperature is reached.
Handle hot tub top with care, please keep hot tub lid on when not in use. The lid is easier to move with 2 people.
Solo use of the hot tub is not recommended. Underage guests in the hot tub must be monitored by an adult at all times. Alcohol and glass are not allowed near the hot tub. You are not allowed to use the hot tub if you have consumed alcohol, have underlying medical issues which would prevent use, or if you are pregnant. Please consult with your healthcare provider if you have any questions about safe usage of the hot tub. Use the hot tub AT YOUR OWN RISK!

BEAR COUNTRY
DO NOT FEED BEARS! KEEP DOORS TO HOME AND CARS SHUT/LOCKED AT ALL TIMES! Bears come down the mountain frequently/daily and can open car doors. Please read up on bear safety. Keep food in the unit, with doors shut and locked. You can place full trash bags (tied) in our trash cans, within the bear proof receptacle. Please ensure you lock the receptacle and have the trash cans lid shut tight. If you encounter a bear incident where you feel unsafe, please contact the Gatlinburg police department.

WILDLIFE
You will likely see and hear animals, critters and insects. These are the Smokies after all!

description: Enjoy a memorable vacation in the Great Smoky Mountains in our cozy cabin, “Honey Bear Getaway.” Located between Gatlinburg & Pigeon Forge, you will be close to all the attractions.  We offer the following amenities to make this the perfect getaway✓ King bed in master suite with jacuzzi and sep. shower✓ Two Twin beds in loft✓ Queen sofa bed✓ Hot tub✓ Electric Fireplace ✓ 65" 4k TV in LR, 55" in Loft & 50" in BR w/ YouTubeTV, Netflix and Movies✓ Fast WiFi✓ Washer & dryer✓ Charcoal GrillThe spaceIn the living area you will find a 65” 4k HDR flat screen TV with YouTubeTV, Netflix & hundreds of new release movies on Movies Anywhere, there is a deck with hot tub and sitting area, electric fireplace (available all year), sleeper sofa that converts into a queen size bed with a brand new mattress and chair.  If you decide to spend a night in, our kitchen offers all the cookware needed to prepare a home cooked meal or takeout/delivery (GrubHub delivers!). Out on the secluded deck you can relax on the porch swing or enjoy the hot tub while listening to the babbling creek behind the cabin.Guest accessGuests will have access to the entire property except for the owner's closet.Other things to noteWe do not allow pets at our cabin due to allergies in the family.  Thank you for understanding.
additional_house_rules:
Thank you for choosing our cabin! All guests must review and agree to the following rules before booking:
- No refunds will be given for storms. Mountain roads can be curvy and steep. We highly recommend a four-wheel drive vehicle during the snow months. We do not refund due to road conditions.
- All guests must be at least 25 years of age to rent this cabin. People other than those in the Guest party set forth in the on-line agreement may not stay overnight in the property. Any other person in the property is the sole responsibility of Guest. Guests are not allowed to exceed the occupancy limit agreed to in the on-line itinerary. No more than 6 persons (excluding infants) are allowed in the cabin at any time.
- The cabin is privately owned; the owners are not responsible for any accidents, injuries or illness that occurs while on the premises or its facilities. The Homeowners are not responsible for the loss of personal belongings or valuables of the guest. By accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use of the premises or others whom they invite to use the premise.
- Please use appliances ONLY for their intended use.
- WIFI/CABLE SERVICE: Our internet and cable provider is responsible for the speed, reliability and quality of internet service provided which can be affected by weather.
- HOUSEKEEPING: There is no daily housekeeping service. Bed linens and bath towels are provided along with basic kitchenware and utensils. A starter supply is provided of personal soap, dish washing detergent, toilet paper, trash bags, and paper towels. Please note, we do not supply shampoo or body wash. Please be sure to pack your own.
- WATER AND SEPTIC: Honey Bear Getaway is on well water. Please do not flush anything down toilets but toilet tissue. Feminine products, baby wipes etc. should not be flushed at anytime. If it is found that such products were flushed and a clog results you may be charged all fees associated with unclogging and resulting damages.
- HOT TUBS: Hot tubs are drained, cleaned and refilled after each guest stay. The bromine floater in the tub should provide the proper amount of chemicals to maintain the water quality. Hot tubs should not be used if you are pregnant or have health conditions where extended periods in hot water may not be safe. Children must be supervised at all times and never left unattended in the tub. Jewelry may become discolored from the chemicals. Never put additives such as bath salts or bubbles in the hot tub. Hot tub covers must remain on hot tubs when not in use. DO NOT STAND OR SIT OR PLACE ITEMS on hot tub covers. If cover is damaged by you, you will be required to pay for replacement. No children under 18 years of age in hot tub without adult supervision.
- OUTDOOR GRILLS: A charcoal grill is provided for guest use. Guests are expected to read and adhere to all instructions regarding use of grill.
- FIREPLACES: Fireplace season is Oct 1 – March 31. The fireplace will be shut off after this period. Do not place hands in or around fireplace or any vent. 
- We require that you place all trash in bear proof containers outside and latch the metal clip in place, leave the kitchen clean, dirty dishes ran through dishwasher. Lock all windows and doors; turn off lights, TV’s etc. before you depart.
- DAMAGE: In the event of damages or extra cleaning requirements created by guests, additional charges may be applied from damage deposit.
- WILDLIFE AND PESTS: The Great Smoky Mountains has more than 1,000 square mile of continuous wilderness including the Great Smoky Mountains National Park, National Forests, state parks and wilderness areas. Though relatively rare, black bear and other wild life can be encountered outside of these wildlife sanctuaries. Wildlife normally will stay away from cabins and chalets unless it has been food conditioned. For your own safety and the protection of our wildlife, we request that guests behave in an appropriate manner and keep their distance and that you do not feed bear, raccoons or any wildlife. You also need to make sure all food and garbage is secured so that wildlife does not have access to it. DO NOT LEAVE FOOD OR FOOD WRAPPERS IN YOUR CAR, bears have exceptional noses and may cause damage trying to get at the food/wrapper.
- There are also plenty of insects. Honey Bear Getaway is treated monthly however it does not eliminate all pests. Certain times of the year we experience high volumes of a beetle which looks like a lady bug they are harmless just a nuisance. Other frequent pests are wood boring bees and wasps.
- Failure to comply with the above rules will result in non-return of security deposit and possible additional charges. Booking through Airbnb assigns your consent to all listed under "House Rules"
interaction: We offer instant self check-in upon arrival. We do our best to respond as quickly as possible to any questions you may have during your stay. Send us a message and we’ll get back asap.
transit: "Honey Bear Getaway" is located right in between Gatlinburg and Pigeon Forge, just minutes to the Parkway.  Once you get to the Parkway, you can take the trolley all around the popular places in Pigeon Forge and Gatlinburg.  We do recommend having a car to be able to enjoy the surrounding areas.

description: WELCOME to Country Rhodes. Our All WOOD cabin is PRIVATE yet close to everything! KING Master with Twin Bunks  with 2 full baths in the sought after Chalet Village area!  Easy drive up from stop light 10.  SPECTACULAR VIEWS from the 2 decks!  At night you can see the lights of Pigeon Forge!  HOT TUB!  Don't miss out, our cozy cabin offers privacy yet easy access to all area attractions! Flat Screen TVs, Washer/Dryer, WIFI, Direct TV! Community Pool Access in Season!The spaceThere are no steps to enter the cabin.  The first thing you will notice upon entering is the spectacular view from the living room windows! You will enter the cabin on the main floor, which has the kitchen and living areas. The main floor also has a bedroom with twin bunks and bathroom with shower. Downstairs you will find the King Master bedroom, second full bathroom and pool table! All furniture is brand new!   Enjoy your morning coffee while relaxing on one of the two covered decks.  After a day of hiking or exploring relax in the hot tub to soothe those aching muscles.  All while enjoying the beautiful views!Don't forget to sign our guestbook!...Guest accessYou will have full access to 100% of the cabin via keyless entry. There is a motion light for ease of access in the evenings.Guest will also have access to Chalet Village Clubhouses (tennis courts, game rooms and pools in season from Memorial Day to Labor Day)Please note: although the roads are very well maintained by the city due to the high elevation 4x4, snow tire/chains are recommended during snow eventsOther things to noteThere are active bears on and around the property.

description: Newly Renovated Condo in Downtown Gatlinburg! Lofts at Gatlinburg Place - 402 -  a gorgeous 1 bedroom 1 bathroom condo with private balcony steps from the Strip! Park your car and walk to all the Action!!The spaceWe are chic, new and updated!! Come and experience the fun and excitement of Downtown Gatlinburg from your new condo home at the Lofts at Gatlinburg - 402. * 1 bedroom (queen bed)* 1 Full bathroom * 2 Tvs - Living room and bedroom* Wifi* Gas Fireplace (available in the Winter)* Community Pool (available in the Summer - duh!)* Free Parking - Park and Walk everywhere Downtown!* Elevator* Trolley stop - near our building* Laundry facility - on the ground floor* Fun and Excitement - Just waiting for you!!Guest accessThis is a totally private condo - just for you!! additional_house_rules:
21 Min Age to Book

Lease Agreement
1. Check In Time: 4 PM - Check Out Time: 10 AM
No late check-outs or early check-ins without permission from the owner. 
MAX Occupancy: 6
2. This is a NON-SMOKING Condo. No smoking is allowed in our condo. There will be a $500 fine for any guest that smokes in our condo along with any fees to clean and deodorize the condo.  
3. PETS ARE NOT ALLOWED - ANY PET Found to occupy the condo will be charged a pet fee of $500 in addition to any damage that may have been caused by your pet. Housekeeping staff performs a thorough inspection after every guest checks out to ensure compliance with this policy. 
4. Cleaning - Your stay rate includes a one-time towel and linen set up. There is NO DAILY MAID SERVICE - while linens and bath towels are included in the cabin, daily maid service is not included in the rental rate. Please leave all wet or dirty towels at end of your stay either in jetted tub or shower.   Dishes - dishes, pots/pans, and utensils are provided. Please wash any dishes used during your stay and put away leaving condo in the same condition as guest found it upon arrival. 
5. Trash - please place all trash in condo trash dumpster as you depart which is located in the parking lot near Baskins Creek Road. 
6. RESERVATIONS
RATE CHANGES - Rates vary thru-out the year and are subject to change. Once your reservation has been booked and a deposit is paid, your rate is locked. 
FALSIFIED RESERVATIONS - Any reservation obtained under false pretense will be subject to forfeiture of advance payment, deposit and the party will not be permitted to check in. 
7. STORM POLICIES/ROAD CONDITIONS/FIRES- although our condo is located in a populated resort area with very little steep inclines, the surrounding area may experience road condition issues during storms, snow, sleet or icy weather. No REFUNDS will be provided for Storm / weather related cancellations or FIRES that are not under the control of the owner. 
8. Fireplace – our condo has a gas fireplace that is available for our guests to use seasonally in the winter months. You are not allowed to put anything into the fireplace or adjust the programmed settings on the fireplace. 
9. Our condo is privately owned and the owners are not responsible for any accidents, injuries, or illness that occurs while on the premises or its supporting facilities. The owners are not responsible for loss of personal property or valuables of the guest. By accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use of the premises or others whom they invite to use the premise. 

When accepting and completing your reservation – you acknowledge and agree to terms of this contract and agreement. 
* Credit Card/Bank Draft: Guests hereby give permission to debit their account for any charges for damages or fees according to this agreement.
interaction: I work with a team that helps me out - If you need anything don't hesitate to let us know and we will be here to help! We try to respond super quick - just give us a holler - we are here to help!!
transit: You can seriously WALK everywhere in Downtown Gatlinburg!! Its awesome!! If you are tired then just grab a ride on the Gatlinburg Trolley! We have a trolley stand right in front of our building!!

description: This cabin has everything for families and couples including hot tub, jacuzzi, pool table, multi-game arcade, foosball and great views from the deck. The cabin is one of the largest 1 bedroom / 2 Story floor plans in Gatlinburg Falls Resort - with almost 1,700 sq ft of space.  The cabin is easily accessed year round with flat / level city maintained streets.  Located 5 minutes from downtown Gatlinburg and 10 minutes from Pigeon Forge - you are minutes from everything yet feel miles away.The spaceThe first floor (entry level) has a master bedroom, kitchen and living area. The second floor has an open floor plan with game room (arcade, pool table, Foosball table), living room area with flat panel TV (blu ray included).Guest accessThis is a private two story cabin.  You have the entire cabin to yourself / your family/friends.Other things to noteAll adult guest (over 18) must be at least 25 years of age to rent cabin. This cabin is intended for individuals, couples and families who intend to respect the cabin. This is NOT a “party and trash” cabin. The resort will evict guest who are disruptive to other guest in the resort without refund. There is absolutely no smoking in the cabin.If you are looking for a great cabin to make great memories - you’ve found the right place :)
additional_house_rules: Guest are expected to act responsibly and maturely. The cabin is intended for families, couples and/or individuals looking for a relaxing, clean safe place to stay.  Resort maintains policies against excessive noise and misbehavior.  Abuse or violation will result in immediate termination of rental with no refund.
interaction: We are available to help guest with any issues they might have.  We have maintenance staff for any urgent situations which can arise. Additionally - we are always happy to share recommendations on activities, restaurants, etc. We want you to have a great experience from check in to check out.
transit: One of the best things about this cabin is the location. Located right at the Great Smoky Mountain National Park. description: Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay.Fresh mountain air and beautiful wooded views await you at this studio cabin. Boasting a well-appointed master suite loft, foosball table, and sleeping arrangements for 4, this cabin is the ideal romantic getaway or family retreat. Soak up the soothing sounds of nature from the private hot tub, explore the various attractions of town, or go on an adventure in Great Smoky Mountains National Park just minutes away.The spacenull.
additional_house_rules: By confirming your booking, you agree to adhere to the Rental Rules set forth in this listing and this document.  If you bring more humans than agreed upon by your reservation you will be asked to leave without a refund and/or charged an extra $25 per human per night.  - All guests must be 25, except children accompanied by their parents - Quiet time after 9pm - Clean up after yourself.  - Maintenance is not available during your stay unless it's an emergency. If something is broken it's because the previous guest didn't tell us. If you see something, say something.  - Before you leave, we ask that the items below be completed to help our housekeeper prepare for the next guest: Please empty the fridge. Take all trash to the bear proof can in the driveway. Please load all dishes into the dishwasher and run it.  - The hot tub will have been professionally cleaned prior to your arrival. - We have stocked the cabin with many items including start-up supplies. However, you will likely need to supplement with your own during your stay such as toilet paper, paper towels, soaps etc.  EXCHANGE OF MONEY AUTOMATICALLY CONSTITUTES ACCEPTANCE OF ALL TERMS AND CONDITIONS SET FORTH HEREIN. Cabin Rental Agreement: First and foremost, Relax, Breathe, Laugh, Love and Live. 1. Smoking is NOT allowed and Drugs of any kind are NOT permitted 2. People other than those in the Guest party set forth in the on-line agreement may not stay overnight in the property. Any other person in the property is the sole responsibility of Guest. Guests are not allowed to exceed the occupancy limit agreed to in the on-line itinerary. 3. Guests should not create excessive noise at a level that disturbs neighbors; Neighborhood quiet hours are from 9:00p.m. – 8:00a.m. If you plan to party do not book this cabin. It is our home and you must treat it with respect.  4. All of the units are privately owned; the owners are not responsible for any accidents, injuries or illness that occurs while on the premises or its facilities. The Homeowners are not responsible for the loss of personal belongings or valuables of the guest. By accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use of the premises or others whom they invite to use the premise. Use of the surrounding community areas including any sort of swimming or water facility (if applicable) is the sole risk or the renter, guest, and their guests.  5. Keep the property and all furnishings in good order, removing any items from the cabin including living and kitchen furnishings is not permitted, and you will be charged accordingly if anything is removed. 6. Only use appliances for their intended uses. 7. Parking: Number of vehicles is not allowed to exceed the number indicated in the listing. Vehicles are to be parked in designated parking areas only. Parking on the road is not permitted. Parking in the neighbor’s driveway is not permitted. Any illegally parked cars are subject to towing; applicable fines/towing fees are the sole responsibility of the vehicle owner.  8. Check-in/Check out times. Please follow the check-in and check out times as indicated in the listing. 9. Housekeeping: There is no daily housekeeping service. While linens and bath towels are included in the unit, daily maid service is not included in the rental rate. We do not permit towels or linens to be taken from the units. Before you leave, we ask that the items below be completed to help our housekeeper quickly prepare for the next guest. Please load all dishes into the dishwasher and run it on the normal cycle. Please remove and dispose of all items in the refrigerator. Place used towels in the bathtub. Do not wash towels prior to departure. Please leave sheets and comforters on the beds.  10. Please lock all doors and all windows upon departure.  11. Garbage: Any garbage must be stowed in the proper bear-proof garbage receptacle, located near the driveway. Please do not stuff the bear box so full that it’s impossible to remove the bags, and please do not leave any loose trash in the bear box.  12. Hot Tub: [No children under the age of 18 permitted in hot tubs at any time without adult supervision]. When using the hot tub, remember there is a certain health risk associated with this facility. Use at your own risk. Our housekeepers drain, sanitize, refill and replenish chemicals in all tubs prior to your arrival; therefore, it may not be warm until later that evening. [DO NOT SIT OR STAND ON THE HOT TUB COVER. Hot tub covers are for insulation purposes and are not designed to support a person or persons. They will break and you may be charged for replacement.] Remember when not using the hot tub, leave cover on so hot tub will stay warm.  13. Water and Septic: The cabin is on a well and septic systems. The mineral content in the water is high. During a drought, the well water may have an odor. The septic system is very effective; however, it will clog up if improper material is flushed. DO NOT FLUSH anything other than toilet paper. No feminine products should be flushed at any time. If it is found that feminine products have been flushed and clog the septic system, you could be charged damages of up to $1000.  14. Absolutely No Grease in the Kitchen Sink  15. Storms: No refunds will be given for storms. [Mountain roads can be curvy and steep. We highly recommend a four-wheel drive vehicle during the snow months. We do not refund due to road conditions.  16. Any damage to any items in the cabin including couches, chairs, tables, TVs, pool table, hot tub, beds, sheets, towels, pillows, etc., are the responsibility of the renter. Every item will be looked at before arrival and after departure. If you cause damage, notify the owner immediately. We will find it and charge you regardless. It is our home. Treat it as if it were your own.  Failure to comply with the above rules will result in non-return of security deposit and possible additional charges. Booking through Airbnb, VRBO or any other means assigns your consent to everything listed within this document.

description: Located at 3,000ft Gatlinburg Summit has unrivaled Smoky Mountain views. Our unique unit unlike other units at this property is newly built in 2016(other buildings were built in 1984). Our Studio Loft unit includes a private balcony with incredible180 degree views including Mt. Leconte. It includes a real wood burning fireplace, new furnishings, full kitchen, granite countertops, new appliances, FAST Private Wi-Fi, Cable w/HBO, & Free Netflix. Outdoor, indoor pool & two hot tubs in the ClubhouseThe spacePoolhouse temporarily closed, indoor pool and hot tub will NOT be available for unknown period of time. Outdoor pool will be available.Our unit is truly unique. Recently built in 2016. Enjoy the unobstructed, unrivaled, 180-degree view along with all the modern amenities and furnishings. From the custom stone fireplace, the exposed wooden beams, to the granite countertops, this unit will make you feel at home in the mountains.**Please be aware that due to unbelievable views, great location, and amenities at The Summit of Gatlinburg, a large number of units have been popping up on AirBNB. Not all units at The Summit are equal. Only a select number of units in certain Bldgs have the GREAT VIEWs. Make sure the view pictured in the listing is from their private balcony. On listings that don't specifically show the balcony view make sure to ask that host what building they are in. Only Buildings 1, 6, 7, & 8 will have the GREAT views. The pictures posted here are from Matt's balcony and are real photos from his balcony.Kitchen:New granite counter-tops, appliances, cabinets. Full-size refrigerator/freezer, K-Cup Coffee Maker and regular coffee maker, full size stove/oven, full size dishwasher, microwave, toaster, plates, cups, pots, pans, and all basic cookware. NEW-Added a 4qt CrockPot and Brita water filter pitcher.Living Room:Tall vaulted ceilings with real wood burning stone fireplace. Comfy couch and leather recliner. Brand NEW 55" Sharp 4k Curved HDTV. Private High-Speed WiFi. Private Balcony off living room, and alcove bed with stunning views of Mt. Leconte. Two comfortable rocking chairs with a table to enjoy the views while drinking a glass of wine or your favorite drink.Bathroom:Full Bathtub/Shower. Granite countertop vanity. Towels, hand towels, wash cloths, make up cloths as well as a basic starter set of Shampoo, Conditioner, Lotion, and soap supplied.Beds:Queen size alcove bed is tucked away off living room space. This bed has tremendous views of the mountains. You can lay in bed and enjoy all the views. Upstairs is a stand alone Queen size bed in the loft area.  Also upstairs in the loft is a Vanity Table with mirror, another hair dryer and a sitting area with two chairs and small table. Fresh and comfy linens, blankets, and pillows all included.Location:Gatlinburg Summit is located in a wonderful area that is a very quiet and peaceful setting. While it is atop the mountain in order to have the magnificent views, it is still close to all the action. You are just around the corner from Ober Gatlinburg. You can skip all the Gatlinburg traffic by taking the bypass and arrive quickly and stress free. Downtown Gatlinburg is quickly accessible by 4 different locations to give you plenty of options including Ski Mountain Rd(Light #10), Sugarlands Welcome Center in the National Park(via bypass), Light #3 at Ripley's Aquarium(via Campbell Lead Rd) and the entrance of Gatlinburg(via the bypass). All of these options are just a short 10-15 minute trip. In addition, Pigeon Forge is right down the road via the bypass in about 15-20 minutes. Don't feel like driving much? Take a very short drive to Ober Gatlinburg(less than 2 miles) and ride the scenic Aerial Tram into downtown Gatlinburg. The trams run every 20 minutes so you can return whenever you please.Guest accessGuests have full access to all facilities at Gatlinburg Summit including: Outdoor Pool, Indoor Pool, 2 indoor hot tubs, clubhouse, small arcade, laundry room, picnic/grill area, basketball goal.Other things to noteWhile I don't have "Instant-Booking" turned on, I always respond very quickly. If you see in gaps in my calendar for 1 or 2 night stays that don't meet the 3 night minimum feel free to send me an inquiry. I generally will allow these as they form in the calendar. If this space is booked or doesn't accommodate you and your guests properly please consider my other units at the same location.Wild bears do wander onto the property often. Please do NOT feed the bears or attempt to interact with them for your own safety.
additional_house_rules:
Absolutely No Smoking of any kind allowed. Any evidence of smoking will result in forfeiture of Security Deposit. 

My HOA has a strict - No Pet Policy. We fully comply with FDA Service Animal requests, however Emotional Support Animals(ESA) are not permitted. Service Animals that are individually trained to do work or perform tasks for persons with disabilities are welcomed. Comfort or Emotional Support Animals are not Service Animals, and therefore not permitted. I apologize for any inconvenience, this is an HOA rule that is strictly enforced, of which I have no control over.
interaction: I am available as much or little as needed by phone, text, or email. I am very knowledgeable about Gatlinburg, the National Park, Pigeon Forge, and Sevierville area. I was a 2-3 times a year tourists to the area for 30 years before owning this condo. My wife and I married in Gatlinburg so it is truly a special place for us and we would like to make your trip special and memorable for you.
transit: Convenient access via Gatlinburg Bypass. Close to the aerial tram at O'ber Gatlinburg. Free public transportation throughout Gatlinburg via Trolleys.

description: The Hideaway is the classic Smoky Mountain cabin for you and your special someone.Conveniently located minutes from downtown Gatlinburg, this little cabin provides proximity to all the attractions but is far enough away to escape it all, tucked away in the woods as well.It has a wood-burning fireplace, but we recommend you purchase Duraflame, or similar product, they last 3 to 4 hours , and you don't have to go rummaging around in the woods to try to find nothing but small twigs...The spaceThe Hideaway provides a unique forest experience, 10 minutes from the famous Downtown Gatlinburg. Spend your evening grilling on the charcoal grill and preparing your favorite meal for your loved one. Later on, head to the back deck, where you can relax and listen to the trickle of the hidden stream below. Inside you will find a cozy space filled with rustic cabin decor, full kitchen, living space, wood burning fireplace, a foosball table and a comfy king size bed.Other things to noteOnce you turn on Boyd Blvd, look on your left for the Hideaway Hill mail box. Your woodsy nook is up this drive and is the first on your right! Do note, that the hill is steep to get up, but all kinds of small cars have made the trek, so just take take it slow. 😊 You know your in the smokies when your hills have hills!https://smokymountains.com/park/things-to-do/synchronous-fireflies-smoky-mountains/
additional_house_rules:
If guests violate any of the house rules, they forfeit the opportunity to leave a public review. 

Day of check out.

Check-out time is at 10:00am, we ask that you would please complete our check-out list before leaving the cabin.

1.)  Please load and start the dishwasher and hand-wash anything that doesn't fit.

2.) Empty the refrigerator of all items and either take them with you or put it in the garbage. 

3.) Take out all trash to the outdoor trash cans.

4.) Do not wash any linens as they all go out to get washed and fresh clean linens come in.

5.) Turn the A/C to 68, or heat down to 66 and turn off all electronics (T.V's, lights & coffee pot), for the outdoor jacuzzi please turn it down to 100 degrees as it will be emptied and cleaned for next guests.

6.) Check that all the doors are locked.

7.) Text, or message me that you have checked out 812-493-9387.

description: Nestled near the Great Smoky Mountains, Dancing Blues invites you to relax in a cozy cottage. Conveniently located only 1 mile from Downtown Gatlinburg, Dancing Blues is only minutes to all the restaurants, attractions, & entertainment that Gatlinburg & Pigeon Forge has to offer.  Dancing Blues offers a king bed, living room with a sleeper sofa, arcade game, foosball, a fully equipped kitchen, picnic area, parking for 2 cars, and so much more!Enjoy your getaway at Dancing Blues!The spaceHave you been looking for the perfect romantic getaway? Enjoy the king size bed and relax in the rain shower after a long day of hiking or exploring downtown. Or maybe a family vacation? For the young and the young at heart, there's an ARCADE GAME with 60 games for you to choose from. There's even a queen size mattress on the sleeper sofa in the living room for the kids to enjoy!Upon your arrival, you'll find a welcome basket with some goodies and information. You'll also discover a starter supply of Paul Mitchell Shampoo and Conditioner and Dr. Bronner's Organic Soap!During the wintertime, cuddle up by the electric fireplace in the living room and watch a movie on the flat screen TV. Keep your connection with the rest of the world with WiFi and basic cable. Feel free to login to your own Netflix account.For the cooks of the family, you'll find a coffee maker, outdoor charcoal grill (please bring your own charcoal and lighter), full size refrigerator, ice maker, pots and pans, dishwasher, stove/oven, utensils, and microwave to make all your favorite dishes. Please bring your own charcoal and matches and NEVER leave grill unattended.If you're ready to explore the area, you're only a short drive to the City of Gatlinburg (1 mile) or Pigeon Forge for a day full of fun! Or if you want to get away from it all, you can drive in the Great Smoky Mountains National Park for hiking, photography, or a nice, quiet drive.Guest accessThere is parking for 2 vehicles.Other things to noteNo animals allowed due to severe allergies and asthma of the owner. Must be 21+ to book.
additional_house_rules:
Rental Party: The rental party shall consist of Renter and stated number of guests as indicated on the Airbnb Reservation Details page. Renter is responsible for his/her guests. Guests are not permitted to spend the night in the chalet. People other than those listed in the Guest(s) party number may not stay overnight in the property. Any other visitor to the property are the sole responsibility of Renter. Guests are not allowed to exceed the occupancy limit agreed to. This reservation is NON-TRANSFERABLE. Only the party on our owner records is permitted in the chalet and only for the designated dates and time. You are not allowed to re-rent, sublet, transfer, or otherwise sell rental time to anyone. The person on record as the renter MUST be present on site. 
Maximum Occupancy: The maximum number of guests is limited to 4 people. 
Homeowner Responsibility/Liability: The Cottage is privately owned; the Homeowner is NOT responsible for any accidents, injuries, or illness that occurs while on the premises or its facilities. Homeowner is not responsible for the loss of personal belongings or valuables of the guest. Please double check for all of your personal belongings prior to departure as we have no way to store or ship lost or left behind items. By accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use of the property or others whom they invite to the property. 
Damages Upon Arrival: Upon arrival, please inspect the chalet and notify Homeowner of any damages. Otherwise, you will be charged for all damages/missing items. 
No Smoking: Smoking is not allowed inside or outside the chalet. Smoking inside or outside the residence will result in civil litigation to recoup the cost of damaged property and cleaning fees. 
No Pets: Pets are not permitted on the property at any time. Contact owner if traveling with a certified Service Dog. 
Length/Term of Rental: The rental begins and ends as is indicated on the Airbnb Reservation Details page. 
Check-in & Check-out Times: Check-in time is 4 p.m. Check-out time is 10:00 a.m.
Photo Identification Required: Renter is required to provide a copy of his/her government issued ID in order for the reservation to be confirmed and to be permitted access to the chalet. 
Cancellations: Contact Homeowner immediately for cancellation. There is a strict no refund policy on cancellations. However, Homeowner will attempt to reschedule if possible. 
Refund Policy: No refunds will be provided for any reason.
Insurance: It is strongly recommend that the Renter purchase vacation insurance. 
Thermostat Settings: Air-conditioning shall be set no lower than 69 degrees. Het shall be set no higher than 74 degrees. Thermostat settings are monitored remotely. If the Renter sets the thermostat higher or lower than is permitted causing the system to seize or break, repair charges will be charged directly to Renter. 
Doors and Windows: Doors and windows are to remain closed at all times except in an emergency. Tennessee is home to various wildlife including bear, deer, coyotes, raccoons, lizards, scorpions, snakes, mice, dangerous spiders, etc. It is not safe to leave doors and windows open. 
Noise: Guests should not create excessive noise at a level that disturbs neighbors AT ANY TIME; Code-enforced neighborhood quiet on-premise hours are from 10:00p.m.–8:00a.m. If we receive noise complaints about Renters and/or guests, you will be advised to cease any excessive noise or vacate our homes (rental property) at once with no refund. If necessary, the proper authorities will be involved. ABSOLUTLY NO FIREWORKS ARE ALLOWED TO BE SET OFF AT THE PROPERTIES AT ANYTIME. 
Water & Sewer: The sewer system is effective; however, it will clog if improper material is flushed. DO NOT FLUSH anything other than toilet paper and human waste. DO NOT FLUSH feminine products, flushable or diaper wipes, pet feces, or adult products. If it is found that feminine products, adult products, or any other materials have been flushed and clog the system, the guest will be charged for damages including plumbing fees, calls to plumbers, and cost of repair and/or replacement. A plumber typically charges $500.00+ and water damage can cost much more. Please dispose of feminine hygiene products and other adult products in a trash can. 
Fireplace: The fireplace is an electric fireplace. Do not throw anything into the fireplace to avoid causing harm to the property and to yourself. When using the fireplace, guests must be inside the chalet, and the fireplace must NEVER be left unattended. 
Appliances/Grill: Only use appliances for their intended uses. A charcoal grill is at the cottage. Renter agrees to not move the grill from its location on the property. The grill must NEVER be left unattended as it is near the cottage. Grill at the chalet should treated with respect. In addition, please scrape grill after use and remember to replace the grill covers.
Items in the Chalet: The chalet is not a hotel owned by a multi-millionaire. The Homeowner has purchased everything in the cabin by saving from his every day job. Bedding, Towels, TV’s, Etc are not to be removed from the property. Inventory is taken after every Renter leaves. Theft of items will result in criminal prosecution. 
Use of Premises: Utilize property, furnishings, & appliances properly and keep in good working order. 
Weather: Roads to the Cottage are paved, flat, and are generally well maintained. However, the roads may become hazardous during times of winter weather, and we highly recommend using four- wheel drive, snow tires, and/or chains during the snow, inclement weather, and winter months. Stay tuned to the local weather for any issues and notifications. The Homeowner does not refund due to road conditions at any time as Mother Nature is out of our control. In addition, we do not issue refunds for early departures.  If there are storms/hurricane/fire/snow/rain warnings or watches, no refunds will be given unless the State or Local authorities order mandatory evacuations in the vacationing area of The City of Gatlinburg. The day that the authorities order a mandatory evacuation in a Tropical Storm/Hurricane/Fire/Tornado/Snow Warning area, we will refund:  1.	Any unused portion of rent from a guest currently registered;  2.	Any unused portion of rent from a guest that is scheduled to arrive, and wants to shorten the stay, to come in  after the Hurricane/Storm/Fire Warning is lifted; and/or c. Any advance rents collected or deposited for a reservation that is scheduled to arrive during the "Hurricane Warning" period. No refunds will be given for rain, sleet, or snow. 
Access: Renter shall allow Homeowner (or a representative of the Homeowner) to access the property for the purpose of repair and inspection. Homeowner shall exercise this right in a reasonable manner and provide reasonable notice. 
Parking: Parking is limited to 2 vehicles. Vehicles are to be parked in designated parking areas only. Parking on the road, double parking, or blocking driveway of others is not permitted at any time. Any illegally parked cars are subject to towing; applicable fines/towing fees are the sole responsibility of the vehicle owner. Use of parking brake is encouraged. 
Garbage: All trash is to be placed in the proper garbage receptacle IN A BAG located in the kitchen and baths. PLEASE CLEAN OUT ALL ITEMS FROM THE FREEZER/FRIDGE PRIOR TO DEPARTURE. All trash MUST be in a garbage bag. Upon departure from Cottage: take ALL trash to the bear proof trash can located on the corner of the property. Please do not leave any trash outside as Tennessee is home to many forms of wildlife. You will be charged additional clean up fees for excessive removal of trash from the properties or if you failed to or did not secure trash in receptacle. 
Housekeeping: There is no daily housekeeping service. While linens and bath towels are included in the chalet, daily cleaning service is not. You may wash the linens in the washer/dryer provided for fresh towels daily. We do not permit towels or linens to be taken from the units. Loss or removal of towels, linens, or bedding from the chalet will result in criminal and civil prosecutions. Please abide by all rental agreement policies and follow departure instruction checklist to avoid additional charges. 
Furnishings: Keep the property and all furnishings in good order. You are welcome to move furnishings to be comfortable but please place back in their original position. All of our bedding, as well as all pillows are covered with Allergy/Bed Bug Protectors. Please DO NOT REMOVE these covers. They are in place for our guest’s protection and you will be charged for replacement costs or any bed bug extermination or replacement of pillows/mattress(es)if you are found to have removed them. The chalet is inspected after every stay. If bedbugs are found after your stay you will be responsible for charges up to $2000.00+ for removal. 
Starter Supplies: There is a starter supply of paper towels, toilet paper, soap, shampoo, conditioner, coffee, etc provided. Please keep in mind this is only a starter supply and may not last for your whole trip so please plan accordingly. 
Departure Instructions: Please clearly follow all departure instructions to avoid additional fees. Additional copies of this agreement are also posted in the chalet. 
Firepit: Always stay at fire pit when in use. NEVER leave fire pit unattended. Only burn firewood in fire pit. In case of emergency, water hose is located outside the back door.
interaction: I am available 24/7 by phone.
transit: Dancing Blues is conveniently located only 1 mile from downtown Gatlinburg with city maintained, paved roads.

description: Imagine finding a stunning and secluded cabin sitting on 25 private acres in the hills of the Great Smoky Mountains, one of the top travel destinations in the world. A vacation home that's just minutes away from the local arts district, the most visited national park in America, the heart of downtown Gatlinburg and countless other places to explore. By booking a stay at Mountain Lodge Gatlinburg in the Smokies, that beautiful and tranquil dream location will be your home away from home.The spaceGuests looking for a unique property that is filled with character and luxurious perks will enjoy time at Mountain Lodge Gatlinburg. The property is perfect for travelers seeking a location for a romantic getaway, some solo time for working remotely, a trip with friends, and more. The abundance of outdoor living space and hot tub fit wonderfully with the desire to blend the peacefulness of the mountains with a stay at a high-quality vacation home. The stunning views of the Smokies can be seen from each of the 3 levels of the home and complete the scene at this 5 Star locally owned superhost home. Guests enjoy spending time on the oversized porch swing and luxurious patio furniture, sipping on Tennessee Homemade Wines while the colors of the sunset spread across the sky, and making dinner on the Big Green Egg. The interior of the home is filled with custom craftsmanship that was put in place by the owner’s father with care and love. Furnishings are all cozy but high-quality, as are extras like robes, towels, and Ugg bedding. A fully stocked kitchen, coffee bar, large flat screen televisions, strong wifi connection, a fireplace, custom showers, and a top floor master suite with jacuzzi tub and stunning views of the mountains all provide everything you could possibly need for your stay. Mountain Lodge Gatlinburg has an ambiance that is rarely found in a vacation home, but one that you truly have to experience for yourself.Guest accessGuests have complete privacy on the 25 acres of land and access to the entire home.Other things to noteMountain Lodge Gatlinburg is 4 miles from downtown Gatlinburg, less than 5 minutes from the Gatlinburg Arts and Crafts Community, 10 minutes away from Great Smoky Mountains National Park access, and if you take the scenic route on the backroads you can be at Dollywood within 20 minutes.
interaction: As a Superhost we take pride in being here for our guests 24 hours a day when needed. Southern Hospitality and quick responses are two things you can expect while visiting.
transit: We recommend driving to all the nearby shopping and attractions but Uber is always available if needed.

description: Complete with a private deck and hot tub, heart-shaped tub, and a full bathroom, this studio cabin is the perfect escape for lovebirds flocking to Gatlinburg and the Great Smoky Mountains. Make the 10-mile drive to Ober Gatlinburg to catch a ski lift, buckle into a ride at Dollywood, or delight your taste buds at Sugarland Cellars. Take a scenic stroll to see Laurel Falls, explore the exhibits of Ripley’s Aquarium, and spend peaceful evenings snuggling up by the romantic cabin's fireplace!The spaceCouples’ Cabin | Private Hot Tub | Pool AccessThe aptly named 'A Chance for Romance' Gatlinburg cabin is perfect for couples wanting a mountain retreat with nearby ski slopes, trailheads, vineyards, and entertainment.Studio Cabin: King BedOUTDOOR LIVING: Private hot tub, deck, gas grill, seating, community outdoor pool (seasonal), walking trailsINDOOR LIVING: Heart-shaped tub, stone fireplace, flat-screen TV,  large windows, high ceilingsKITCHEN: Well-equipped, drip coffeemaker, dishware and flatware, 2-person tableGENERAL: Air conditioning, free WiFi, linens/towels, laptop friendly, complimentary toiletries PARKING: Street parking in front of the cabin (2 vehicles)
additional_house_rules:
- No smoking
- No pets allowed
- No events, parties or large gatherings 
- NOTE: Your safety matters. The property features an exterior surveillance camera on the porch, facing out towards the street. This does not look into any interior spaces
- Must be at least 25 years old to book
- Additional fees and taxes may apply
- Photo ID may be required at check-in
interaction: Evolve makes it easy to find and book properties you’ll never want to leave. You can relax knowing that our properties will always be ready for you and that we’ll answer the phone 24/7. Even better, if anything is off about your stay, we’ll make it right. You can count on our homes and our people to make you feel welcome--because we know what vacation means to you.

description: As you drive beneath the canopy of oak and pine trees down the winding country road to MountainLoft, you feel as though you’re entering the nearby Smoky Mountains National Park. From an elevation of 2,200 feet, the clubhouse and vacation home afford sweeping views of the mountainside. Catch a glimpse of deer or a black bear from your window. Amenities in the room include a full kitchen and bath, a separate living and dining area, and a washer and dryer.The spaceAt the foot of the Great Smoky Mountains, charming Gatlinburg awaits you. The Smoky Mountains National Park offers numerous activities such as fishing, horseback riding, biking, picnicking or hiking throughout 800 miles of trails. In town, Gatlinburg bustles with activities all its own. Take in the scenery from high above on a chair lift or take off on an adventure at one of the many theaters, museums, arcades or amusement parks. To see and do:Smoky Mountains National ParkDollywood®Gatlinburg Sky Lift Space Needle (360° view)Ober Gatlinburg Amusement ParkRipley’s Aquarium of the Smokies®Ripley’s Believe It or Not!® MuseumMiniature Golf, Arcades and GamesSnow SkiingFly-fishingWhitewater RaftingHorseback RidingHiking and BikingCades CoveGuest accessParking is on site, no charge, one vehicle per villa. No trailer, boat or RV parking available.Other things to note$100 deposit required upon check-in with major credit card; refunded if room in good order upon check-outMust be at least 21 to check inWasher/dryer in unit
interaction: You can contact the concierge with any questions you may have.
transit: Visit the concierge desk for reservations and tickets to all the local shows and attractions, then explore the area by trolley. Spend the afternoon driving to Cades Cove and see so much nature!

description: This  peaceful Tiny Cabin has great views of Mount Le Conte which is the third tallest mountain in the smokies! Enjoy great  features such as a private deck with seating and an amazing hot tub to enjoy the views without a human in sight. The cabin has wifi and cable tv. Conveniently located near Gatlinburg and Pigon Forge both.  Exterior facing security camera is present that records movement for the added security of our guest.The spacePerfect for couples or a couple with a small child. Please note the second bed is a FutonGuest accessGuest accessThis cabin is owner operated. You will get the code for the key box. Check in time is 4 pm, and check out time is 11 am.Other things to notePLEASE NOTE! The cabin is on a one lane mountain road and has a very steep driveway.   On camera on property however it points to driveway do not touch All persons Must be 25 or older to stay here without a guardian!No Pets Allowed.We do not offer late check out or early check in.The cabin is in the woods you will see and hear critters.
additional_house_rules: Quiet time after 10pm. The driveway is Steep. We do not offer refunds for weather please plan ahead. Exterior facing security camera is present that records movement for the added security of our guest.
interaction: We prefer to stay in contact. Please let us know when you have arrived and text with any needs during your stay.
transit: Refunds are not given for weather. Snow is not common and our winter guests are hoping for it as it makes the mountains more beautiful. It's up to you to be prepared with all wheel drive and groceries.

description: Clean and quarantine friendly hotel room at awesomely convenient location! Minutes' walk to downtown strip and Gatlinburg Trail and 5-minutes drive to National Park Sugarlands Visitor Center. FREE parking. Flexible self check-in. Fast WIFI (80mb down/30 mb up). Recent upgrades-new accent wall, bed, mattress, fridge, microwave, smart lock, curtain. Ideal for self-sufficient travelers to enjoy both downtown life and close to nature at an affordable price. We look forward to hosting you soon!The spaceRecently renovated rooms featuring cabin-feel and quarantine friendly.  Free parking and couple of minutes' walk to the strip without the downtown traffic and noise.  Ideal for budget and self-sufficient travelers looking for a bare bone place to stay and don't mind the dated outside look of an older motel in process of upgrading.Guest accessThe entire private room and private bathroom are available to our Guests during stay.  If you need anything out of the ordinary, please ask for help from our staff in the office during office hours.Other things to noteWe are still wrapping up the renovation/transition of a couple of rooms of our property and apologies in advance if any inconvenience you experience during your stay.  We'll do our best to make your experience better.
additional_house_rules:
--No smoking in rooms allowed.  $100 charge for any smoking in room.
--Quiet time from 10 pm - 7 am the next day.  Please respect your neighbors.  $50 fine if reported by other guests for loudness.
--Self service during stay.  We will clean and sanitize rooms after check-out and before check-in.
interaction: Onsite staff is available to help as needed during work hours (10am-5pm, seven days a week).
transit: Most of fun places are within walking distance.  If you prefer to take a ride, a Trolley Station is two minutes’ walk from motel - just walk down the street and it is on your right.  Free onsite parking is available for all guests.

description: Moonshine Cabin is situated on top of a foothill with a short drive off of the Parkway.  It is above the hustle and bustle of the tourist area and gives you the feeling like you are a world away !The cabin has 2 bedrooms with a queen size bed in each.  It has a game room with a full size sleeper sofa.  It can sleep up to 6 people.  Cabin has 2 full bathrooms with hair dryers, tub/showers and a laundry room with a washer, dryer, iron and ironing board.  Fully equipped Kitchen.The spaceThe guests have use of whole house EXCEPT garage for parking vehicles.  Garage has two trash cans, for guests to use.Fireplace is NOT operable for guests.Other things to noteMinimum age of 23 to book.  Wood burning fireplace not for guests.  We are sorry about that due to fire hazards.  Thank you.

name: The Star Window: A Modern Honeymoon Cabin
amenities: Outdoor shower,Washer,Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper,TV,Air conditioning,Indoor fireplace,Smoke alarm,Wifi,Kitchen - Space where guests can cook their own meals,Refrigerator,Cooking basics - Pots and pans, oil, salt and pepper,Dishes and silverware - Bowls, chopsticks, plates, cups, etc.,Coffee maker,Fire pit,Outdoor dining area,BBQ grill,Free parking on premises,Hot tub,Long term stays allowed - Allow stay for 28 days or more
description: This High Lux Modern Farmhouse cabin is designed for the ultimate romantic getaway.  With an oversized freestanding bathtub, a walk-in shower for two, 28-jet hot tub, and an oversized Star Window in the master bedroom, and outdoor shower, and many other amenities this cabin will leave you breathless.  With no front or side neighbors, you'll feel like you have the entire mountain to yourself to relax and enjoy your time together.The spaceThe Star Window is a 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom luxury cabin designed with couples in mind.Master Bedroom: features a king sized bed with high end linens and an oversized window giving beautiful forest views and a Star Window that provides a romantic backdrop of the night sky.Master Bathroom: Oversized freestanding bathtub positioned to allow forest views while maintaining your privacy.  Double sinks with ample room, and a large walk-in shower for two with body sprayers and an oversized rain head.  Please note, in order to maintain maximum water pressure, not every fixture can be run simultaneously.Master Porch:  an Overhead door opens from the Master Suite onto a private balcony with outdoor seating.  When the weather is nice, leave it open and enjoy the fresh air from the comforts of your cabin.Great Room:  Unlike most honeymoon cabins, The Star Window is not a studio, but a true 1/1 cabin with a large great room.  The Great Room has a gas fireplace available for your use and ample windows to enjoy the scenery and natural light.  Kitchen:  Fully stocked kitchen that looks like it came out of a magazine!  Everything you need for your romantic getaway including a banquet dining space.Outdoors: Outdoor amenities include fire pit, hanging swings, grill, corn hole, horseshoe pit, rocking chairs, a 28-jet hot tub and, best of all, an outdoor shower!  With so much natural beauty to take in, you'll want to spend as much time outside as you will inside and these amenities make that easy to do!Please note, the hot tub is drained and cleaned after every guest and needs several hours to heat back up.  Depending on when the previous guest checked out, it may not be at an optimal temperature for your first night stay.Other things to noteThe Star Window is in the mountains in Chalet Village.  Wild animals are plentiful in the area, so please make sure to lock your car doors!

description: Don't settle for your vacation rental - Go Above and Beyond with the right cabin! A view right from your living room, the finest mountain views in Gatlinburg, a comfortable cabin which can sleep up to six; these are just a few of the many exceptional features vacationers can enjoy when renting the Above and Beyond unit, at a brand new complex in TN. You don't have to stay at the same old hotel or motel chains you have stayed in when vacationing in years past. As a matter of fact, you can gather a group of friends who love hunting, fishing, hiking, and enjoying the scenic outdoors. The exquisite features/design -  This spectacular cabin space really does go above and beyond, with all the fine features, exquisite design, and picturesque, scenic mountain views, you can experience from the comfort of your living room reclining the seat. Some of the features travelers are going to enjoy when staying in this cabin suite includes:  - Subtle, soft color-scape, which matches the fine exterior mountain views you are going to enjoy from the home. - An extremely peaceful atmosphere, away from the noise, hustle, and bustle, and loud city lights. - Comforting, deep, rich furnishings and furniture, which truly bring out that woody, grainy, cabin feel during your stay. - Two full bedrooms and two full baths (for individual couples who are vacationing together, or for a larger family with teenage kids traveling with them). A hot tub is going to truly make your stay in this cabin rental even more exceptional when traveling. Enjoy the warm, bubbly waters, when its a bit chilly at night, and toast with a glass of wine out on your deck/patio area, to a great vacation with family and friends. With a community pool, accommodations for your pets, and Jacuzzi tubs in both bathrooms, you can truly enjoy the most luxurious, lavish accommodations, without having to break the bank during your vacation in this home. Don't bring a thing when staying at Above and Beyond.  When you stay in the Above and Beyond cabin, you don't have to worry about the cutlery, plates, dishes, or cooking utensils, as they are all included in the rental price you pay for this vacation property. If you prefer dining in (to save money, avoid dining out, or because you prefer a home-cooked meal), you can do so in the full, professional grade kitchen space. Linens, towels, and everything you need is all available for you to use during your stay. So all you have to pack is your swimsuit, and clothing you plan on wearing.  Nearby attractions including Dollywood, Ober Gatlinburg, and Tanger outlets (for the shopping enthusiast), will make your stay in the middle of nowhere (that remote cabin feel), seem like you are right in the middle of the action when you drive out just a few miles to these top area attractions. Enjoy the best of both worlds at Above and Beyond (quiet mountain views, and nearby area attractions), to make your stay truly exceptional. When planning your trip to TN, this is the perfect property rental, with everything you need at your fingertips, all for a great price. description: Welcome to Ultra View! The name says it all! The very best views in Gatlinburg, TN await you at this gorgeous cabin that sleeps 8!  Only 3.6 miles to downtown Gatlinburg, this cabin boasts a private deck overlooking The Great Smoky Mountains National Park and Mt. Leconte!  This cabin has been decorated by a famous interior designer who has been featured on HGTV and DIY Network!  "Ultra View" features 3 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms as well as a sleeper sofa!  Don't forget about the hot tub with a huge view!  Gatlinburg awaits!The spaceThis cabin offers the very best views in all of Gatlinburg, TN!  It features a private deck and hot tub with panoramic views of The Great Smoky Mountains National Park and Mt. Leconte (the highest mountain in the park)!  The cabin has been completely renovated and is ready to help guests create that Smoky Mountain Experience!Guest accessEntire CabinOther things to noteMust be 21 or older to book this cabin.This cabin sleeps 8 guests maximum.We always recommend 4x4 drive for anywhere in The Great Smoky Mountains.  The cabin features paved roads all the way up and without any inclement weather any car should be fine but again, we recommend 4x4 wheel drive when visiting the area.Gas fireplaces are seasonal and operate around October-March give or take depending on the weather.Coffee maker is a Keurig.
additional_house_rules: No Pets.  No Smoking.  No Exceptions.  Must be 21 or older to book this cabin.

description: Welcome to Cozy Bear Cabin! This beautiful 3 bedroom A-frame cabin is a remarkable Smoky Mountains getaway. Private yet close to all the attractions, located between Gatlinburg and Pigeon Forge. The Cozy Bear Cabin is nestled in the woods, you can enjoy the fire pit out front and the bubbling outdoor hot tub on the covered back deck.The spaceCozy Bear Cabin is a 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom A-frame cabin. The bedrooms feature queen sized log beds. Entering the main level the living room boasts a stunning wall of windows, a stone fireplace, leather furnishings, and a flat screen TV. Just off the living room is the fully stocked kitchen with all appliances and necessary utensils to cook your favorite meals. The dining area features a log table that seats up to six people comfortably. The master suite, second bedroom, and bathroom are located on the main level. The master suite has access to the back covered deck and hot tub. Head upstairs and you will find the loft game room and third bedroom. The loft game room features a foosball table and a whiskey barrel arcade with over 60 classic games.The front of the cabin has a beautiful custom fire pit. Roast marshmallows, relax, and gaze at the Smoky Mountain stars. The covered back deck is private and features an outdoor hot tub, comfy rocking chairs, and a BBQ grill. Whether you are looking for a family vacation or a relaxing mountain getaway, Cozy Bear Cabin is the perfect place to stay. Come make memories at Cozy Bear Cabin and the Great Smoky Mountains today!Other things to noteThe Cozy Bear Cabin is in a very central location. Easy access from the Parkway and 5 miles from both Gatlinburg and Pigeon Forge. House Rules: No pets allowed. If this rule is violated, you will be charged an additional $300 cleaning fee. Please practice fire safety when using the fire pit, do not leave the fire pit unattended. No smoking. No fireworks.
additional_house_rules: No pets allowed. If this rule is violated, you will be charged an additional $300 cleaning fee. Please practice fire safety when using the fire pit, do not leave the fire pit unattended. No smoking. No fireworks.

description: **PRICES VARY THROUGHOUT THE YEAR, SO BE SURE AND CHECK PRICE FOR YOUR RESERVATION DATE! Welcome to "Mountain Soul". Built in 2018, this cabin in the heart of the Smoky Mountains. Conveniently located to both Gatlinburg and Pigeon Forge, TN. We are also close to the Arts & Crafts area down Hwy 321.We hope you love "Mountain Soul" as much as we do! We have done our best to make it a place of beauty and relaxation for your body, mind & soul. The perfect "getaway" for a few days.The spaceWe lost our previous cabin, "Heaven's Gift" in the 2016 Gatlinburg Fire. "Mountain Soul" is our re-built cabin that we took great care in making a perfect "home away from home" for us and all our guests.  You can sit on the wrap-around porch and have dinner while gazing at the great Smoky Mountains, or have morning coffee off the Master Bedroom deck, soaking in views of Mt. Leconte.  Comfortable beds, an open kitchen, and many personal touches around the cabin make "Mountain Soul" a place of peace and comfort. We hope you leave feeling refreshed and rejuvenated!*NOTE: While Mountain Soul is not located in a cabin community, there are other cabins within eyesight on the mountain, and we have one cabin right next door that we share a parking area with.  We are not a completely isolated cabin in the woods. *Our kitchen is fully stocked with cookware, baking trays, dishes, glasses, mugs, and utensils. Everything you need to cook basic meals should be there.  All linens and towels are also provided.  Bring your clothes and whatever food you want to eat and you should be good to go!Guest accessWhole house.Other things to noteMountain Soul shares a nice size parking lot and driveway with one other cabin, Twinflower Summit so there is plenty of parking. Easy in/out.Our cabin is at the VERY TOP of the Kings Ridge mountain, so be prepared for a 7 min drive from the bottom of the hill to the top, which will include a few steep and curvy spots. Trust us, you'll get used to the drive and it's so worth it when you see the views!  No need for a 4-wheel drive.  It can be managed very easily with just a regular vehicle.  However, if you are nervous about mountain road driving, we encourage you to arrive before dark on your first drive up. For even more up to date info on Mountain Soul, you can follow us on Facebook or Instagram  @mountainsoulcabin

description: Have an unforgettable Tennessee vacation when you stay at 'Cabin in the Clouds,' a 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom vacation rental cabin. This newly built home boasts 1,800 square feet and comfortably sleeps up to 4 guests. Look out over the surrounding mountains on the expansive deck, take a relaxing soak in the private hot tub, or watch the game by the bar downstairs! This cabin is ideally located just 10 minutes from downtown Gatlinburg making it the perfect home base for your next mountain getaway.The spaceMaster Bedroom: King Bed | Bedroom 2: Queen Bed Step through the front door and into the bright and inviting living space that welcomes you with gorgeous wood finishes and mountain decor. Take a seat in the plush armchairs and watch your favorite show on the flat-screen TV next to the gas fireplace. Open to the living room is the fully equipped kitchen featuring a 3-person breakfast bar and modern appliances. Whip up your favorite recipe and eat with loved ones around the 4-person dining table with views of the surrounding mountains. After dinner, head downstairs to relax on the 2 sofas as you watch the game on the flat-screen TV. Enjoy a nightcap at the bar with seating for 2 or make your way onto the expansive deck to soak up the views! Take a relaxing dip in the private hot tub before rinsing off in the outdoor shower. When you're ready for bed, retire to the master bedroom featuring a flat-screen TV, direct deck access, a king bed, and en-suite bathroom. Two more guests can rest easy on the queen bed in the second bedroom which also features a flat-screen TV and deck access.Other things to noteKey Residence Features:- Amenities include a fully equipped kitchen, free WiFi, in-unit laundry machines, 4 flat-screen TVs, expansive deck with outdoor furniture, private hot tub, outdoor shower, mountain views, driveway parking for 4, and more - Scenic Gatlinburg location - Close to hiking, biking, fishing, zip line tours, whitewater rafting, shopping, restaurants, museums, Dollywood, horseback riding, and much more!- Nearest Commercial Airport: McGhee Tyson Airport - 2055 Alcoa Hwy, Alcoa, TN 37701, ( 41.6 miles)

description: Make memories with your family at Sierra Bravo Cabin!- Perfectly hosts 4 but can accommodate 6 (family with children)- Hot Tub for 4- 2 Arcade Machines- Fully equipped kitchen- Loft designed with families in mindYou are only:10 mins to the Gatlinburg strip28 mins to Dollywood14 mins to Great Smoky Mountains National Park★ "This was our first experience ever doing an Airbnb and the standard will be sky high after staying at Scott and Kelli’s cabin." ★The space- Parking for 2 cars (maximum)- 1 King Bed, 2 Twin Beds, 1 Sofa Sleeper with upgraded air-over-coil mattress- 2 Arcade Style Machines with 60+ Retro Games- 3 Roku 50” TVs- Fully Equipped Kitchen with all the essentials for a family dinner - Washer & Dryer- Electric Fireplace- Charcoal Grill★ "This cabin exceeded our expectations! Truly a home away from home. Scott was incredibly communicative and helpful, the cabin was immaculate, stylish, comfortable, and remarkably equipped with not a single accommodation or detail overlooked to ensure we had a perfect stay." ★Guest accessYou will receive your door code before you arrive. The whole house is yours for your stay.Other things to noteOur driveway is steep like many roads and driveways in the Smokies but we like to set expectations. Most of our guests drive right up to the parking pad with no problem and some choose to park at the end of the driveway - it all depends on their comfort level. If it has snowed we recommend a 4WD vehicle to drive up to the parking pad. XL vehicles may have some difficulty turning around to head back down. If you’d like, you can park at the end of the driveway (it’s not long) and walk up the incline. We’ve left a utility cart beside the cabin to assist you with your gear if you choose that option.★ "Don't let the steep driveway scare you! You can always park at the bottom and walk up. We had no issues driving our Tahoe up the driveway." ★★ "No problems with it on our end, plenty of room to turn around, and up/down was fine even in rain. Certainly an option to park halfway or at the bottom and walk up what amounts to about a flight of stairs." ★

No smoking or vaping. There will be an extra $250 cleaning fee if you do.

No pets. There will be an extra $200 cleaning fee if you bring one in.

-Late check out fee $100 per hour
Please note we charge a pet fee of $100. 2 pets max. No cats please. 
NOT TRAILERS
If you will bring a pet without permission you will be charged a $300 fee.

If adverse weather conditions (snow or ice) are present, it is required to have chains or 4/all wheel drive.

VACATION RENTAL SHORT TERM LEASE AGREEMENT

1. Maximum Occupancy. The maximum number of persons allowed to stay in the Property is limited to 6 unless the Owner gives its prior written consent. If more than 6 stays, you will be asked to leave immediately with NO REFUND. The person named on the reservation must be present during the reserved dates. The minimum age of a person making a reservation is 18 years. No substitutions or transfer the reservation to another family member or friend.

2. Keys & Access Codes. The owner will provide the Guest with a code, which will unlock the front door to the Property. Any attempt to access a locked area just causes for immediate termination of this Agreement, forfeiture of all rent paid, and Guest will be liable for any missing items or damage.

3. Acts of God. If there is a storm or severe weather and a mandatory evacuation order is issued by state or local authorities, the Guest shall be entitled to a prorated refund for each night Guest is unable to occupy the Property. The owner will not be liable or deemed in default under this Agreement for any failure to perform or delay in performing any of its obligations due to or arising out of any act not within its control, including, without limitation, acts of God. We cannot refund monies for severe or inclement weather that may interfere with your travel to/from the cabin. Accordingly, we do strongly encourage you to consider purchasing travel insurance.

4. Cleaning. Daily housekeeping services are not included in the rental rate. Throughout the rental period, Guests will be responsible for keeping the Property clean and in good condition. Any unsafe or dangerous condition must be reported to the Owner immediately. Guest acknowledges that on the Arrival Date, the Property is in good condition, except for any defect Guest may report to Owner by the end of the first day following the Arrival Date. The Property should be left in the same condition as it was found by the Guest on the Arrival Date. Guest promises to leave the Property in good repair.

5. Mechanical Failures. The owner attempts to properly maintain the Property. While all electrical and mechanical equipment within the Property is in good working order, the Owner cannot guarantee against mechanical failure of electrical service, stopped plumbing, water supply, heating, air conditioning, audiovisual equipment, internet access, cable service, hot tubs, or appliances. Guest agrees to report any inoperative equipment or other maintenance problem to the Owner immediately. The owner will make every reasonable effort to have repairs done quickly and efficiently. Guest will allow the Owner or a person permitted by the Owner access to the property for purposes of repair and inspection. The owner is not responsible for any inconvenience that may occur. Much like all appliances and equipment within your own homes, malfunctions can be unpredictable and have lengthy solutions at
times. We have knowledgeable maintenance staff and a wealth of options for specialists in all areas. Specialists, however, have schedules of their own as well as waiting periods for certain parts if needed. Please be understanding in these circumstances.

6. Limitation on Liability. The owner is not responsible for any accidents, injuries, or illness that occur to any member of the Rental Party or Guest’s visitors while in the Property or on the Property. The owner is not responsible for the loss of personal belongings or valuables belonging to any member of the Rental Party or any of the Guest’s visitors. Guest agrees to assume the risk of any harm arising from the use of the Property. UNDER NO CIRCUMSTANCES AND UNDER NO LEGAL THEORY, TORT, CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR OTHERWISE, SHALL OWNER BE LIABLE TO GUEST OR ANY OTHER PERSON FOR ANY DAMAGES OF ANY NATURE WHATSOEVER INCLUDING ARISING OUT OF OR RELATING TO THIS AGREEMENT OR GUEST’S RENTAL OF THE PROPERTY OR USE OF THE PROPERTY. IN NO EVENT WILL THE OWNER BE LIABLE FOR ANY DAMAGES IN CONNECTION WITH THIS AGREEMENT, EVEN IF THE OWNER SHALL HAVE BEEN INFORMED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.

7. Violation of Agreement. If Guest or any member of the Rental Party violates any of the terms of this Agreement, including but not limited to maximum occupancy, visitors, and rental rules and restrictions, Owner may evict Guest and the Rental Party from the Property and Guest will forfeit all rent and security deposit paid.

8. CANCELLATION/REFUND POLICY: Our policy is STRICT. Please note: general travel insurance does not cover all situations, including Covid-19. You can find “CFAR” policies (cancel for any reason), which can be added to almost any travel insurance policy. There are several options and you can almost surely find one that fits your needs and budget. Simply search google for “CFAR travel insurance” and you will find several websites available to assist you. We do not offer any refunds for No Shows, regardless of the situation. NO REFUNDS can be issued for early departure, malfunctions of equipment (i.e. Hot Tubs, Televisions, Wi-Fi, Fireplaces, HVAC Units, etc.), or weather conditions. NO REFUNDS ISSUED FOR NATIONAL PARK CLOSURES, CLOSURE OF ATTRACTIONS/
RESTAURANTS, ETC.

Pet Addendum
1. Tenant agrees to the following terms:
     a. Tenant shall be responsible for Tenant’s Pet at all times.
     b. Tenant will take all reasonable action to not allow Tenant’s Pet from creating a nuisance, annoyance, and disturbance to the other tenants and neighbors.
     c. Tenant’s Pet will be kept in appropriate areas within the Premises and will not be left unattended for an undue amount of time. 
     d. Tenant’s Pet will be under the full control of Tenant at all times and is allowed outside the Premises only if contained in a fenced-in area or restrained on a leash or in a pet carrier.
     e. Tenant will clean up and properly dispose of all pet waste inside and outside the Premises including any and all common areas.
     f. Tenant will comply with all applicable community association rules, statutes, local ordinances, rules, and regulations.      

2. Tenant shall be liable for any damage, loss, or injury caused by Tenant’s Pet. Tenant will pay all costs to repair, clean, or replace any damage to the Premises including but not limited to carpets, floors, tiles, walls, doors, screens, windows, blinds, drapes, cabinets, landscaping, and fences.

4. Tenant will pay a pet fee of 100$. Max 2 dogs no cats.

5. Tenant shall indemnify, hold harmless and defend Landlord against any and all liabilities, judgments, actions, suits, costs, expenses, losses, or claims by third parties for injury to a person or damage to property caused by Tenant’s Pet.
