Located on a private wooded lot where you will have plenty of peace and quiet.  This house is over 2,000 sq ft and allows plenty of space and activities for everyone to enjoy!The spaceOn the main level you will find an open kitchen, dining room with gas fireplace, living room with an electric fireplace and a queen bed sleeper sofa. In addition, this level contains a large master suite which contains a stacked stone surround jetted tub and also has an ensuite bathroom.  Upstairs there is a loft and another large bedroom.  The loft has a pool table and video games along with a futon allowing for a place to just hang out and have some great family time.  The upstairs bedroom also has another king sized bed with a jetted tub and also its own ensuite bathroom.  Downstairs is all about entertainment!  You will find a large theatre room and a large arcade room where you can spend many hours having a blast (No quarters required)!  Outside on the main deck you will find a large hot tub for relaxing after a long day of visiting all the great local attractions Pigeon Forge and Gatlinburg have to offer.Guest accessLocated up the mountain so some portions of the drive involve steep inclines and curvy roads.  Parking is available in front of the house itself.Other things to noteIf you are booking during winter months, it is highly recommended you watch the weather and make sure you have the appropriate type of vehicle (4WD or chains) in the case of wintry conditions.

description: Clean and quarantine friendly hotel room at awesomely convenient location! Minutes' walk to downtown strip and Gatlinburg Trail and 5-minutes drive to National Park Sugarlands Visitor Center. FREE parking. Flexible self check-in. Fast WIFI (80mb down/30 mb up). Recent upgrades-new accent wall, bed, mattress, fridge, microwave, smart lock, curtain. Ideal for self-sufficient travelers to enjoy both downtown life and close to nature at an affordable price. We look forward to hosting you soon!The spaceRecently renovated rooms featuring cabin-feel and quarantine friendly.  Free parking and couple of minutes' walk to the strip without the downtown traffic and noise.  Ideal for budget and self-sufficient travelers looking for a bare bone place to stay and don't mind the dated outside look of an older motel in process of upgrading.Guest accessThe entire private room and private bathroom are available to our Guests during stay.  If you need anything out of the ordinary, please ask for help from our staff in the office during office hours.Other things to noteWe are still wrapping up the renovation/transition of a couple of rooms of our property and apologies in advance if any inconvenience you experience during your stay.  Our outside area and office are being updated.  Our apologies in advance if they look dated or messy.  We'll do our best to make your experience better.
additional_house_rules:
--No smoking in rooms allowed.  $100 charge for any smoking in room.
--Quiet time from 10 pm - 7 am the next day.  Please respect your neighbors.  $50 fine if reported by other guests for loudness.
--Self service during stay.  We will clean and sanitize rooms after check-out and before check-in.
interaction: Onsite staff is available to help as needed during work hours (10am-5pm, seven days a week).
transit: Most of fun places are within walking distance.  If you prefer to take a ride, a Trolley Station is two minutes’ walk from our place - just walk down the street and it is on your right.  Free onsite parking is available for all guests.

description: **Note: Indoor pool and spas are temporarily closed.**Relax and unwind in our clean, cozy 3BR/2BA condo (1BR is the loft) overlooking Gatlinburg. Just minutes from the national park and Ober Gatlinburg's skiing & snowtubing. Enjoy breathtaking views of the Smoky Mountains, and watch the sunrise every morning from the comfort of your balcony. Keep that camera handy for the local bears! Perfect for a family vacation or a retreat with friends. Please Note: No smoking, parties, or pets allowed.The space**𝗡𝗢𝗧𝗘: 𝗧𝗵𝗶𝘀 𝗶𝘀 𝗮 𝟯𝗿𝗱 𝗳𝗹𝗼𝗼𝗿 𝗰𝗼𝗻𝗱𝗼. 𝗠𝘂𝘀𝘁 𝗰𝗹𝗶𝗺𝗯 𝟮 𝗳𝗹𝗶𝗴𝗵𝘁𝘀 𝗼𝗳 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗶𝗿𝘀. 𝗡𝗼 𝗲𝗹𝗲𝘃𝗮𝘁𝗼𝗿.**Whether you're taking a vacation, staycation, a change of scenery for remote working or school, we've got you covered! •	Fully stocked kitchen with starter coffee, creamer, & sweeteners! •	Wood fireplace, High-Speed WiFi, 4 Roku-equipped TVs (guest mode enabled) with cable and access to your favorite streaming channels.•	Two spacious bedrooms with queen size beds and new memory foam mattresses. •	Roomy loft with a queen size bed. •	Sleeper sofa in the living room. •	Balcony with panoramic view of the mountains and downtown Gatlinburg. You'll want to watch the sunrise from there and see the city lights at night!•	Custom video game console with 1,200+ classic Nintendo, Sega, and PlayStation games!Guest accessYou will have access to:*Our entire condo *Balcony*Outdoor pool (open April - October, weather permitting)*Laundry facility*Playground*Firewood*BBQ grillOther things to note* Absolutely no house parties or unauthorized guests are allowed. You will be asked to leave if there is excessive noise or complaints from neighbors. *We reserve the right to decline any reservation request that is not a good fit for our property. *Please DO NOT use the fireplace if you are not familiar with a wood-burning fireplace. Your safety and that of our neighbors is our #1 priority, so please play it safe and snuggle up in a blanket instead.
additional_house_rules:
Check-In After 3 PM
Check Out by 10 AM
Self Check-In With Keypad
Before Checkout: Remove all trash; remove all food/drinks from the refrigerator; wash, dry & put away dishes; leave linens on the bed and towels in the tub/shower.

Please note: 

We want you to feel at home while you're here, but please remember this is our home too. Please treat it as you would if you were visiting the home of a friend.

If you're staying in the winter months, please  DO NOT use the wood-burning fireplace if you are not familiar with this type of fireplace or if you will be consuming alcohol. Our #1 priority is the safety of all our guests and neighbors. We do not provide matches, kindling, or firewood.

You are responsible for any irreparable property damage or loss. If excessive cleaning is needed, you will be charged an extra fee to compensate our housekeeping staff. 

We are not responsible for any accidents, theft, damage, or injuries outside the condo, including the balcony. This includes any vehicle or personal damage from bears or other wildlife, inclement weather, etc. No refunds beyond the current cancellation policy for inclement weather, sickness, or anything beyond our control.

Enjoy your stay and stay safe!
interaction: Contact us via PM, text, phone, or email. We'll keep you updated on anything that may affect your stay. We want you to be totally happy so you can enjoy a relaxing vacation!PS: Ask us about the restaurants and hidden gems most tourists don't know about!
transit: If you're spending the day or night in Gatlinburg, you can park in one of the many parking garages and walk through town. Or take the trolley through town and into Pigeon Forge. Ride the sky tram to Ober Gatlinburg. Taxi service, Uber & Lyft also available.

description: Welcome to Smoky Mountain Condo!  Long range and gorgeous views of The Great Smoky Mountains National Park and downtown Gatlinburg, TN await you at this wonderful condo!  The condo is located less than 15 minutes to the middle of downtown Gatlinburg!  The condo sleeps 6 guests with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms as well as a sleeper sofa in the living room.  The condo complex offers tons of amenities including indoor and outdoor pool as well as indoor hot tub!  Come visit today!The spaceBedroom 1- King Bed, Smart TVBedroom 2- Queen Bed, Smart TvLiving Room- Queen Sleeper Sofa, Smart TV, Woodburning Fireplace (Bring Firewood)Bathroom 1- Tub/Shower ComboBathroom 2- Tub/Shower ComboKitchen- Refrigerator, Stove, Microwave, Toaster, Dishwasher, Keurig/Regular Coffee Maker (Bring Coffee)Pots and PansUtensilsCookwareLinens and TowelsHigh Speed Internet And Smart TVs Including Cable TV And NetflixCondo Located On The 2nd Floor (Steps)Guest accessEntire CondoOther things to noteThe indoor pool and hot tub are temporarily closed due to repairs.  They are working hard to finish these repairs asap, but we do not have an updated completion date at this time.Must be 21 or older to book this condo.This condo sleeps 6 guests maximum.We always recommend 4x4 drive for anywhere in The Great Smoky Mountains. The condo features paved roads all the way up and without any inclement water any car should be fine, but again, we recommend 4x4 wheel drive when visiting the area.The fireplace is wood burning. We do not provide firewood. The condo complex provides firewood seasonally with no set days.Coffee maker is a regular coffee maker and a Keurig coffee maker combo. (Bring your own coffee)

description: Gorgeous log cabin halfway between Gatlinburg and Pigeon Forge. - Pool table- Hot tub - 3 TVs with Dish- Charcoal Grill- 65" TV in the living room- Unobstructed mountain views- Close to Hiking - 2 Wooded Acres - 15 minutes to the National ParkOne of THE most popular cabins in the area BOOK EARLY  - Road is STEEP (We’re not kidding)  - Has Neighbors- Wifi is spotty at bestOffice Business Hours: 9/8c-6/5c 7 days per week on Airbnb Messenger only.The spaceThe back porch overlooks miles of valley and mountain ranges without a human in sight.The back of the cabin overlooks National Park!- Wifi is a hot spot. It is slow at 15mbps unlimited. - The cabin is on a steep, one-lane mountain road.- We have neighbors - some of which live thereGuest accessYou will get a door code before check-in. No need to meet anyone for keys. You get the whole house to yourself.Other things to noteThe red tape: - All guests must be 25+ (children with parents are allowed) - 6 Human Max - 2 Vehicle Max - Message us before booking if you have more than 4 humans- No Pets. Pets are not allowed. You will be charged $500 if you bring a pet.- We provide a start of toilet paper and paper towels. You may need to buy more. - You will likely see and hear critters- Bears are dangerous - The fireplace is shut down April 1 to October 1 as with every cabin in the area. - We do not send maintenance to the property during your stay. Only after you depart. - The hot tub is for guests 25 and over only. Alcohol is not allowed near the hot tub. You are not allowed to use the hot tub if you have consumed alcohol or you are pregnant. Use the hot tub AT YOUR OWN RISK! - No late check-out or early check-in. If a guest does not vacate the property by 11AM on their scheduled day of departure, the fee for failing to vacate is $50.00 dollars for the first half hour and $100.00 for each subsequent half hour that the guest fails to vacate the property.- No refunds for weather/natural disasters/power outages/other things that are beyond our control. - Soaps, shampoos, toiletries, condiments, zip locks, charcoal and coffee are not provided - Absolutely no fires inside or out. Unauthorized fires (including candles) will be charged $100 plus damages.
additional_house_rules:
All guests must sign a Rental Agreement after booking. You will be sent a link to click and sign. 

This Renter Agreement ("Agreement") is made and effective on the date signed below between ("Owner and/or Manager") and "Guest" regarding the property known as MISTY ("Rental Property")
This Agreement applies to the Guest's stay at Rental during dates indicated on Airbnb and/or VRBO reservation, but also applies to any other dates which may be included if the reservation is changed.
This Agreement applies to all members of the Guest's party no matter the age or affiliation.  Guest acknowledges that Guest is responsible for sharing the renter agreement, and its requirements, with all members of the Guest's party and anyone else permitted onto the Rental Property by the Guest.
In consideration of the rent received and the mutual promises contained herein, Owner of the Rental Property does hereby lease and rent to Guest(s) such Rental Property under the following terms and conditions:
1.	Guest agrees to abide by all rules and regulations contained herein or posted on the premises related to the Rental Property.  Guests obligations include but are not limited to keeping the premises as clean and safe as the conditions of the premises permit and causing no unsafe or unsanitary conditions in the common area and remainder of the premises that Guest uses.  Guests agree not to use the premises for any commercial activities or purpose that violates any criminal law or governmental regulation.  Guest's breach of any duty contained in this paragraph shall be considered material and shall result in the termination of guest occupancy with no refund of any kind.
2.	In no event shall the Rental Property be occupied by more persons than the capacity of the property as stated on the web site or the confirmation letter, without prior approval by Owner.  No fraternities, school, civic, or other non-family groups are allowed unless Owner grants prior approval.  In no event shall Guests assign or sublet the Rental Property in whole or in part.  Violations of these rules are grounds for expedited eviction with no refund of any kind.  Guests hereby acknowledge and grant specific permission to Owner to enter premises at any time for inspection purposes should Owner reasonably believe that Guests are causing or have caused any damage to Rental Property.  Guest further agrees to grant Owner access to Rental Property for purposes of maintenance and repair.  If listed "For Sale", Guests agree to grant access by scheduled appointment upon notification.
3.	In the event Guest wishes to terminate this agreement, Travel Insurance, Damage Protection and any processing or administrative fees are non-refundable.  The refund policy is as stated on VRBO/AIRBNB or the booking site and is incorporated and made a part of this agreement:
4.	A payment of 100% is taken by Owner at the time of the booking.  
5.	A security deposit is required ("Security Deposit") and will be automatically reserved for the booking.  The automatic reserve is conducted by putting a hold or charge on the Guest's credit card for the amount of $500.00 exactly 2 day(s) prior to the arrival date.  The credit card of the last successful payment will be used.  If there are no successful credit card payments, it is the responsibility of the Guest to send $500.00 by check to the Owner to satisfy the Security Deposit requirement.  If, at the end of the rental period, the rental property is returned undamaged beyond normal wear and tear, the Security Deposit will be released in full within five (5) business days.  In the event of any damages, Owner will provide Guest with a full accounting of expenses incurred and deductions made from the Security Deposit.  Should the damages exceed the amount of the Security Deposit, Guest agrees to pay the balance within five (5) business days after receiving notification.  Deductions from Security Deposit may include, but are not limited to: excess cleaning fee, hot tub draining and refilling fee, trash removal fee, missing item replacement costs, damaged item replacement or repair costs, repair costs of buildings or grounds, or other service call fees.  Owner is under no obligation to use the least expensive means of restoration.
6.	Regular payments and security deposits for the booking will be displayed as "Airbnb" on the Guest's credit card statement.
7.	Guests must inform the Owner of their intention to bring children and the specific number.  A child is defined as any person under the age of 18.
8.	If a hot tub or pool is provided at the Rental Property, it will be prepared and tested for proper and safe chemicals prior to or on the day of occupancy.  Misuse of a hot tub or pool by the spilling of foreign substances into the pool, i.e. soap, shampoo, oils, glass or metal will result in a Service Call Charge at the sole discretion of Owner.  Under no circumstances are pets allowed in pools or hot tubs.  Violation of this provision shall be grounds for expedited eviction and forfeiture of all monies paid.
9.	If linens or towels are rented from Owner or supplied with Rental Property, Guest is responsible for lost or damaged items at the cost of two (2) times the published standard rental price for such damaged or lost linens or towels.
10.	In the event Owner is unable to make Rental Property available for any reason other than described above or a reasonable substitute as determined by Owner, Guest agrees that Owner's sole liability as a result of this unavailability is to provide a full refund of all monies paid under this Agreement and Guest expressly acknowledges that in no event shall Owner be held liable for any special or consequential damages which result from this unavailability.  Guest also agrees to indemnify Owner from and against liability for injury to Guest or any other person occupying Rental Property resulting from any cause whatsoever including, but not limited to, injury sustained as a result of use of the phone, spa, hot tub, sauna, whirlpool tub, pool, exercise equipment, elevator, etc. except only such a personal injury caused by the gross negligence or intentional acts of the Owner.
11.	Right to Terminate. Owner may terminate this Agreement upon the breach of any of the terms hereof by Guest.  Guest shall not be entitled to the return of any rental monies paid under the terms of this Agreement and shall vacate the Property immediately.
12.	Swimming Pool and Hot Tub Usage (if provided) – Release of Liability, Waiver of Claims, Express Assumption of Risk and Indemnity Agreement
In consideration for receiving access and/or permission to use any swimming pool, spa or hot tub (“Activity”) at your rental Property or otherwise made available to you as an amenity in conjunction with your rental by management  and or its affiliates and the Owner(s) of your rental Property (“Owners”), you hereby RELEASE, WAIVE, DISCHARGE, AND COVENANT NOT TO SUE, AND AGREE TO INDEMNIFY AND HOLD HARMLESS for any and all purposes management , Owners, and their respective officers, servants, agents, volunteers, or employees (herein collectively referred to as RELEASEES) FROM ANY AND ALL LIABILITIES, RESPONSIBILITIES, CLAIMS, DEMANDS, CAUSES OF ACTION OR INJURY, INCLUDING DEATH, that may be sustained by you or your guests or invitees while participating in such ACTIVITY, whether caused by RELEASEES’ active or passive negligence. 
o	You agree that you are fully aware that there are inherent risks involved with ACTIVITY, including but not limited to possible physical injury (including, but not limited to broken bones, strains, sprains, bruises, concussions, heart attack, heat exhaustion) and loss of life and you choose to voluntarily participate in said ACTIVITY with full knowledge that said ACTIVITY may be hazardous to you, your guests, your invitees, and your property (“You”). YOU VOLUNTARILY ASSUME FULL RESPONSIBILITY FOR ANY RISKS OF LOSS, PROPERTY DAMAGE OR PERSONAL OR EMOTIONAL INJURY, INCLUDING DEATH, that may be sustained by You as a result of participating in said ACTIVITY, whether supervised or unsupervised. You further agree to indemnify and hold harmless the RELEASEES for any loss, liability, judgment, settlement, damage or costs, including court costs and attorney’s fees for both the trial and appellate levels that may occur as a result of or in any way related to Your participation in said ACTIVITY, whether caused by RELEASEES’ active or passive negligence or otherwise.
o	You agree to be responsible for the day to day general safety conditions of any swimming pool and/or hot tub to use at your rental Property. This includes, but is not limited to, keeping the swimming pool, spa and/or hot tub clean of debris, keeping the swimming pool, spa and/or hot tub areas clean, neat and organized, keeping all gates and doors locked and the swimming pool, spa and/or hot tub area secured at all times, and operating the swimming pool, spa and/or hot tub in a safe, responsible manner.
o	You understand that RELEASEES may not maintain any insurance policy covering any circumstance arising from your participation in this ACTIVITY or any event related to that participation. As such, you are aware that you should review Your personal insurance coverage.
o	You hereby certify that you are at least 18 years of age and you are legally competent to enter into this Agreement, including the Release, Waiver, Assumption, and Indemnity provisions contained herein. You agree that it is your express intent that this release shall bind the members of your family and spouse if you are alive, and your heirs, assigns and personal representatives, if you are deceased, and shall be governed by the laws of the State of Tennessee.
13.	The Rental Property may offer access to recreational and water activities, including but not limited to hiking, canoes, bicycles, and swimming.  Guest fully understands and acknowledges that outdoor recreational and water activities have inherent risks, dangers and hazards.  Participation in such activities and/or use of equipment may result in injury or illness including, but not limited to bodily injury, disease, strains, fractures, partial and/or total paralysis, death or other ailments that could cause serious disability.  Guest agrees to fully indemnify and hold harmless the Owner and any and all agents, employees, or contractors for any injury or damage caused by these activities, whether caused by the negligence of the Owners, the negligence of the participants, the negligence of others, accidents, breaches of contract, the forces of nature or other causes foreseeable or unforeseeable.  Guest hereby assume all risks and dangers and all responsibility for any losses and/or damages, whether caused in whole or in part by the negligence or other conduct of the Owners or by any other person.  Guest hereby voluntarily agree to release, waive, discharge, hold harmless, defend and indemnify Owner and any and all agents, employees, or contractors from any and all claims, actions or losses for bodily injury, property damage, wrongful death, loss of services or otherwise which may arise out of my use of Rental Property facilities, equipment, or activities.  Guest further assumes full responsibility for the actions of any and all persons whom he may allow to enter the property during the rental period and indemnifies Owner from any and all claims arising from such other persons.
14.	Check-In / Check-Out Times. Check-in starts at 4:00 PM (CST). Check-out time is 10:00 AM (CST). No Early Check in or late Check outs are allowed. If a guest does not vacate the property by 10AM on their scheduled day of departure, the fee for failing to vacate is $50.00 dollars for the first half hour and $100.00 for each subsequent half hour that the guest fails to vacate the property.
15.	WIFI RULES. Wi-Fi is offered as an amenity to our guests. Please read the following: By accepting this agreement and accessing the wireless network, you acknowledge that you are of legal age, you have read and understood, and agree to be bound by this agreement. The wireless network service is provided by the property owners and is completely at their discretion. Your access to the network may be blocked, suspended, or terminated at any time for any reason. You agree not to use the wireless network for any purpose that is unlawful or otherwise prohibited and you are fully responsible for your use. The wireless network is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind, either expressed or implied.
16.	Good Neighbor Policy. Please remember you are staying in someone’s home during your vacation. Please treat it with care and leave it in good condition at checkout. Guests must follow all rules and regulations of the community in which the home is located.
17.	Property Rules and Regulations. Please observe all rules and regulations governing the use of the property you are occupying which are included in the house manual. These rules apply to both owners and guests, and failure to comply can result in eviction.
18.	Notices. All notices required or permitted under this Agreement will be in writing and sent by certified mail, return receipt requested, by reputable oversight courier, by hand delivery, or by email. 
19.	Applicable Law.  This Rental Agreement shall be governed by, construed under, and enforced and interpreted in accordance with the laws of the State of Tennessee.
20.	Venue and Jurisdiction. The exclusive venues for any civil action related to this Rental Agreement are the United States District Court for the Eastern District of Tennessee, and the County and Circuit Courts sitting in Sevier County, Tennessee. The Parties here-by submit to the personal jurisdiction of all the courts in the previous sentence and agree not to challenge such jurisdiction.
21.	Travel Protection Insurance: Travel protection service is highly recommended and can be purchased directly from a number of independent reputable national providers. Depending upon the source of your booking, it may or may not be automatically added as a separate item on your guest charge folio. If your guest charges on your contract include a separate line item for travel insurance, you are purchasing the insurance and are covered. If your charges do not include a separate line item for travel insurance, you are not purchasing the travel insurance, and you are not covered.
22.	Cancellations and Changes. Reservations may be cancelled or changed by notifying the management in writing at least 60 calendar days prior to your arrival date (“Cancellation Period”). In such instances, the full amount of your Reservation Deposit will be refunded, less a $250.00 administrative cancellation/change fee. In the event of cancellations or shortened stays made after the Cancellation Period, you will be responsible for the full amount of the total booking charges, conditions and restrictions may apply.
23.	Property Availability and Refunds. Entering into this agreement reserves for you the specific property selected at the time of your reservation upon the receipt of your deposit and signed contract. If the specific property reserved is unavailable for any reason, guests will be limited to a full refund or similar accommodation at their election. In no event will the management be responsible for any direct or indirect costs, expenses, fees or other consequential damages resulting from the unavailability of a specific accommodation.
24.	Pets. Pets are not permitted on this property. Bringing a pet on the property is strictly prohibited and will result in a $500.00 charge and immediate eviction from the propery.
25.	No Smoking. Smoking is not permitted in the property or on the presmises. Guests who violate this policy will be charged an additional $500, plus the expense of any necessary cleaning. Violations may also result in immediate eviction and forfeiture of rent.
26.	Garbage: Guest agrees and understands that all garbage must be stowed in the proper bear-proof garbage receptacle, located near the driveway. Do not stuff the bear-proof receptacle so full that is impossible to empty the receptacle and do not leave any loose trash in the bear-proof receptacle.
27.	Candles/Open Flames. No candles or open flames are permitted within the property.
28.	Plumbing/Septic/Well System: The property is on a well and a septic system. The mineral content in the water is high. During drought periods, Guest understands that the well water may have an odor due to the high mineral content. Guest further understands and acknowledges that the property is on a septic system and the system will clog if flushable wipes or paper towels are flushed through the system. No flushable wipes or paper towels are allowed to be flushed down the toilets. If a plumbing problem occurs due to guest misuse the guest shall be required to pay for all repairs.  DO NOT FLUSH anything other than toilet paper through the system. If the system clogs due to any products other than toilet paper being flushed through the system, Guest agrees to pay for all damages to place the septic system back in working order. Additionally, Guest understands that no grease should be washed into the kitchen sink.
29.	Minimum stay requirements. Most of our properties require a minimum stay of three (3) nights. Longer stays may be required during peak seasons and holidays. One week minimum stays apply at some properties during peak and holiday periods, with Saturday arrival and Saturday departure.
30.	Maximum Number of Guests. The maximum number of guests per accommodation is based on the individual accommodation’s ability to comfortably and safely house our guests. If the maximum occupancy is exceeded, you may be asked to vacate the property and forfeit any rental payments.  
31.	Age Requirements. All of our vacation rentals require all adult guests to be over the minimum age of 25 years. This does not apply to children which is defined as any guest under the age of 18 years of age. Guests who violate this policy are subject to immediate eviction and forfeiture of all rental payments. Reservations made under false pretense are null and void and check-in will not be allowed or guests will be asked to vacate the accommodations. This policy includes reservations made by parents or guardians who do not check in, and/or who leave overnight during the length of the stay. 
32.	Departure Policies and Fees:  Please be sure to put all trash in proper containers and place in outside garbage. Please place all dirty dishes in dishwasher and start. We reserve the right to charge an additional housekeeping fee if the home is left abnormally dirty and requires additional cleaning services. Late checkout is not allowed in order to allow our cleaners sufficient time to turn over the property for the next guest.
33.	Housekeeping. Your vacation accommodations will be cleaned to quality standards prior to your arrival and after your departure. You will be responsible for the cleaning of your unit during your stay and for leaving the unit in good condition at check-out. If units are found ab-normally dirty at check-out, additional charges will be charged to your credit card to assist in performing a deep cleaning of the unit.
34.	Amenities:  Included amenities are listed in the property description. Guests are prohibited from removing bath towels from the home and may not be used at a pool or hot tub. A starter supply of paper towels, trash bags, dishwashing and laundry detergent, toilet paper and soap will be provided. It is the responsibility of the guests to supply additional house amenities for the duration of their stay.
35.	Linens, Bath Towels, & Household Supplies:  Included in each property are a full set of bed linens and bath towels. A washer & dryer is provided for the home.
36.	Beach & Pool Towels. Please bring beach and/or pool towels as we do not permit bath towels or linens to be taken from the unit except for laundering.
37.	Maintenance. During your stay, promptly report any maintenance problems to management at metalrentals@gmail.com. No refund or rate adjustment will be made for unforeseen failures such as the supply of electricity, water, pool filtration systems, air conditioning, telephone, internet, television or cable service, appliances, etc.
38.	Damage Policy. Guests are responsible for the property, its contents, and themselves during occupancy. Guests must lock windows and doors securely when not in the premises. Rearranging the furniture or removing any items from the unit is prohibited. GUESTS MUST REPORT ANY DAMAGES PRIOR TO YOUR DEPARTURE. After Check-Out, the management representatives will inspect the unit for damage, missing items, and abnormally dirty appearance. If damage is present, items are missing, or the unit is abnormally dirty, management will repair the damage, replace the missing items, and/or perform a deep clean of the unit at Guest’s expense. Guest authorizes management to charge the credit card on file to reimburse the Property Owner for any such expenses.
39.	Severe Weather– Guests covered by travel protection insurance may be entitled to a refund or partial refund in the event that our local governing officials issue a “Mandatory Evacuation” order for the location of your rental property, provided that you have purchased coverage before the event. Any such refunds shall be subject to the terms, conditions and restrictions. Management does not provide refunds for cancellations or shortened stays due to inclement weather.
40.	Security of Personal Property. We are not responsible for any acts of theft or vandalism, or other damages to any personal property or for personal items left by guest in the accommodation at departure.  Guest is responsible for all shipping costs for any Lost and Found items that Owner is requested to return to Guest.  Items found and not claimed within 30 days will be disposed of at the discretion of Owner.
41.	Prohibited Items:  Smoking and fish cleaning are NOT permitted in the home and smoking is NOT permitted on the premises. No cleaning of caught fish is permitted inside the home due to the odor. Guests who violate these policies will be charged a $500 fee plus the expense of any additional cleaning.
42.	No Subletting. The rental property may not be sublet. Your reservation is not transferable to any other party.
43.	By signing and or submitting payment for this rental, Guests and any Occupants agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless the Owner, Landlord and Rental Property Manager for any liabilities, theft, damage, or expense whatsoever arising from any claim or litigation which may arise out of or in connection with Guests or Occupants use of rental property. This includes any claim or liability for personal injury, illness, damage or theft of property, incurred or sustained by Guests or Occupants. If for some reason the reserved property becomes unavailable and a refund is due to renter, the property manager and owner will not be responsible for any other direct or indirect costs or fees.
44.	Waiver of Jury Trial. BY ENTERING INTO THIS AGREEMENT, THE PARTIES KNOWINGLY AND VOLUNTARILY WAIVE THE RIGHT TO A JURY TRIAL AS TO ANY CLAIMS A PARTY MAY CLAIM TO HAVE AGAINST THE OTHER WHICH ARISES OUT OF THIS AGREEMENT OR THE COURSE OF DEALINGS BETWEEN THE PARTIES.
45.	Entire Agreement. This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement between the parties and supersedes any prior understanding, marketing or agreement among them respecting the subject matter hereof. There are no representations, arrangements, understandings or agreements, oral or written, relating to the subject matter of this Agreement, except those fully expressed herein. No waiver of any provision hereof shall be valid or binding on the parties hereto, unless such waiver is in writing and signed by or on behalf of the parties hereto, and no waiver on one occasion shall be deemed to be a waiver of the same or any other provision hereof in the future.
46.	Severability. If any term or provision of this Agreement is held illegal, invalid or unenforceable, such illegality, invalidity or unenforceability shall not affect the legality, validity or enforceability of the remainder of this Agreement.
47.	Headings. Section and other headings contained in this Agreement are for reference purposes only and are in no way intended to define, interpret, describe or limit the scope, extent or intent of this Agreement or any provision hereof.
48.	Guest Illness.  If, during a guest’s stay, a member of the party becomes seriously ill with a communicable illness, such as Covid-19, guest is requested to voluntarily notify  management of the illness, whether diagnosed or undiagnosed. This voluntary notification will provide the opportunity to arrange for further sanitizing of the home. Guests are also requested to voluntarily notify  management if a member of their party scheduled to arrive in the home has been diagnosed with Covid 19 within 14 days prior to the guest’s arrival date.
NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the mutual agreements and covenants herein contained, Guest has read and agreed to the following:


I understand the rules and rental conditions upon which I am agreeing to rent accommodations, equipment, and use of the property.  I acknowledge and accept that the sole responsibility for safety lies with the participant.  In agreeing to this, I acknowledge that outdoor activities and exposure to the natural elements and animals can be dangerous and sometimes result in injury and even death.  Steps and decks can be slippery, animals and insects can threaten and infect or injure, exposure to the elements can cause hypothermia, sunburn, among other risks inherent in participating in camping, outdoor and water activities.  I know that alcohol and/or drugs do not mix safely with any outdoor activity.
I am over the age of 25 and assume responsibility for those in my charge under the age of 25.  I hereby assume all legal responsibility for bodily injury to me or to any person on the property as a result of my visit and use, operation or possession of equipment hired or loaned to me.  Acknowledging this, I accept complete responsibility for the minor children and myself in my charge and visit the property and equipment and engage in activities or events at my own risk.
I will abide by the rules and accept these rental conditions:
•	The property I rent will be returned in the same condition in which it was rented and I will be responsible for all damage and/or loss that occurs during my rental period.
•	I agree to hold harmless and to indemnify the Owner of the Rental Property against all loss, damage, expense and penalty on account of personal injury or property damage to the rental dwellers, the undersigned or to any minor child or children in the charge of the undersigned, howsoever rising, whether by act or acts or failure to act of the employees, owners or animals of the said company or property owners or not.
•	I acknowledge receipt of the property in good order and condition (if found otherwise per my arrival I will contact Owner immediately) and further agree that the Owner of the Rental Property shall not be liable for consequential damages of any kind or nature from whatever cause arising, whether property or equipment is loaned or rented.
•	I enter into agreement freely with the Owner of the Rental Property at my own risk, acknowledging the risks inherent in indoor and outdoor activities and assume any and all responsibility for the minor children and myself in my charge.
•	All parties agree to and will comply with Federal, State and County pollution laws and any other applicable laws and regulations.

interaction: Office Business Hours: 9/8c-6/5c 7 days per week on Airbnb Messenger only. No phone or text. If you have an emergency please dial 911.
transit: If you want to stay on the flat lands this cabin is not for you. Our cabin is at the top of a mountain off of a historic one lane logging road. Steep, one lane and gravel. Your car will not have any trouble getting up and down, we just like to make things perfectly clear. If you want the view you have to drive up!If it has been raining your car will get dirty. You will need 4 wheel drive if it snows.No refunds are given for weather so please check the forecast before you travel. 4x4 and Groceries if you're lucky enough to get snow.
